It wouldn't be the first time your mom had overflowed the toilet with her dump. There goes all that effort you put into scrubbing her asshole earlier.


"Good morning honey! Mwah," you hear your mom talking again after leaving the bathroom, presumably giving your dad a kiss before sitting down to breakfast. You can't hear what he's saying through the thick blubber but you can hear your mom's answers. "Oh he did amazing as always. He's so good at getting those hard to reach places. I'm sure he wouldn't mind giving you one as well if you just asked." Washing your mom is bad enough, you can't imagine having to wash your dad too. "Sure, sweetie, you're getting to be a big girl so I'm sure you need help reaching everywhere now too." That sounded like she's talking to your little sister, they want you to wash your whole family for them! You're only 10, how can they put all that work on you!? "Speaking of, did he come down to breakfast yet? He disappeared while I was taking a nap... Hmm, maybe he went back to bed, he deserves a good rest for a job well done. I'll let him sleep." You wish you could just go back to bed, or to a therapist for this horrific experience.

Your prison shakes violently with a loud gurgle, which must mean your mom is hungry (not an uncommon occurrence), something she quickly begins to rectify. "Mmm mmm, come to Momma," she says before you hear her start noisily chewing on a mouthful of food. A few seconds after you hear her gulp it down you see a huge mass of your dad's signature triple chocolate chip pancakes topped with peanut butter, caramel, whipped cream, and a pound of butter, all chewed up into unrecognizable mush drop into your prison. Not too long after another mass drops in, and another, and you realize this is quickly going to become a problem. Even though digestion doesn't seem to be an imminent threat, your mom always eats until she's completely stuffed, and that means you'll be buried under her breakfast! You panic as you watch the mound of food continue to grow, but what can you do?

Your mom continues to feast as your dad serves her more and more food, eventually switching from pancakes to scrambled eggs, bacon, and sausage all drenched in ketchup. At least the pancakes smelled sweet aside from.having your mom's spit all over them, but mixing this in just makes the smell in her stomach worse. Dozens upon dozens of eggs get devoured, bringing the food level up to your knees at this point. It's so gross to be wading around in chewed up food, feeling it stick to your skin, but you know soon enough you'll be swimming in it.

You decide to try one last time to get your mom's attention, it can't hurt to try. You desperately bang on the wall of her stomach with your fists screaming for your mommy, and suddenly food seems to stop pouring in! "Mom! Mom it's me in here!" you call to her, thinking you have her attention. "Please stop eating so I can--"

BUUUUURRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP

You're momentarily deafened by an earthquake-like belch coming out of Gina, at which she just laughs, "Ahh, that freed up some space." You never had her attention at all, you just gave her gas. After a waterfall of orange juice pours in she goes right back to chowing down, this time on triple thick French toast. You on the other hand are ready to give up. There's obviously no hope for you escaping this place, so you prepare to accept your fate. The food soon piles up over your head, and you can already hear the gurgles telling you digestion is starting.
14311.title: Tommy in her Tummy

choices: Her thighs as she catches you
1433.content:
"Uhhh, sure Mom, it's no problem..." You reply, your heart sinking. You should have known by now you never get out of these baths easily. You climb back up to the top of the tub and walk to the far end where your mom's feet are. She allows her upper half to slide lower into the tub so that she can place her huge wet feet up on the edge for you to reach. Peering down between her fat thighs you get an unpleasant look at her hairy cooch in the water below.

"Oh thank you so much," she says with a smile. "All this walking around all day is just killer on my feet, you know?" The only places your mom walks to on a regular basis are the kitchen, the couch, and her bed, but lugging around a half to of fat all day probably is exhausting.

You step up to her massive right foot and reluctantly begin working your fingers into her sole. It's a lot worse without the washcloth between the two of you as you can feel your fingers sinking into her squishy flesh. You really wish you had done a better job scrubbing them earlier, they still have a sweaty foot stink to them.

"Mmm that's it honey, that's perfect. You must get this from your dad, he's always great with my feet," Gina sighs with satisfaction. So why not get him to do this for you, you ask in your mind. "You know what, we might as well make this a full pedicure." She pulls her feet away and sits up to reach into a nearby cabinet, pulling out a pair of large nail clippers. She hands them to you and sinks back into the tub, her feet splashing a ton of water onto the side as they reemerge. She just loves having you do more to pamper her.

You resume washing rubbing her right foot, working each of her fat toes individually as she spreads them for you. Then you lug over the big plastic nail clippers and clumsily begin trimming her rather long nails. The things take two hands to maneuver and all of your strength to close, but one by one you trim her nails down to acceptable length from big to little. The trimming from her big toe is big enough for you to brandish as a weapon.

You're about to move over to her left foot when you slip on some of the excess water your mom splashed up. The clippers go flying out of your hands and your mouth, open on instinct to let out a yelp, falls right on her pinky toe. Good thing you just clipped the nail, but your mouth still has the displeasure of tasting her soggy wet, stale foot filling the whole thing. Not a hint of any of the soap you used is even present. Your mom seems to think you did this on purpose.

"Oh my, I didn't think you liked my feet that much, Tommy," she giggles. "You definitely take after your father."

Frantic to get your mouth away from your mom's foot you try to backpedal as quickly as possible, but the slippery ground refuses to let your bare feet get a grip and prolongs your suffering. It's only when you stop trying to run away and simply push away from her foot with your hands that you can escape, but the taste of her old sweat still lingers in your mouth.

Walking more carefully this time you move to her right foot and do the same as you did with the left, starting with the massage. You're a bit more used to the feeling of her feet by now, but it doesn't make this job any more enjoyable.

"Feel free to suck on any of these toes too," your mom reminds you, curling them as if youll find them tempting.

"Oh, no-- no thanks Mom, that was kind of an accident," you tell her.

"Oh don't worry honey, you don't have to pass it off like that. I know you're getting to that age, you want to experiment, and if Mommy's feet are what you want to experiment with, go right ahead." She pushes her foot up against your naked body and giggles as she rubs against your penis, but you back away and try to keep this just about the massage. She only half gets the message. "Oh, I see, you dont want them when they're all clean. Don't worry, in a couple days they'll be nice and sweaty again for you." You retch at the thought of sucking on her toes then. You used to have to leave the room when she took her shoes off because the smell was so bad.

You finish massaging her foot and move to the nail trimming when down below you hear a

FFRRRRBBBLRRRBLUPBLBLUPBLUPBLUP

Looking down into the tub you see a bunch of bubbles appearing around your mom's crotch, and as each of them bursts they release a horrible cloud of fart into the air that rises up to meet you. Your mom just laughs and laughs.

"Looks like I turned on the jacuzzi," she laughs as she continues to fart more bubbles.

PPPHHHHHHHRRRTTTTTBBBLLLPBBBLUUPPBUPPBUP

You try to quickly finish the nail cutting and get out of here before the smell gets too bad, but you're already starting to get dizzy from the sulphuric fumes.

"Okay you're all done mom bye!" you say all at once the moment the last nail drops. You toss the clippers to the side and try to escape as quickly as possible, but once again neglect the slipperiness of the tub edge. You feet go out from under you and you find yourself sliding head first down the slanted wall of the tub straight into...
1433.title: Watch Your Footing

145.content:
Alyssa Morrison (you) - 17 years old, 5"2'. Straight black hair kept up in a ponytail and emerald green eyes. You recently started your first job working as a maid for the King family. They make you wear that whole maid outfit which is kinda demeaning, but $100 an hour makes it slightly more bearable. At least you can try to make friends with their daughter since she's in your grade.

Alex Morrison (your brother) - 17 years old, 7'9". Short black hair and green eyes. He's your twin brother allegedly, he just grew up to be... bigger. Your mom claims he'd suck one boob dry and steal the other one from you, and frankly you'd believe it with how much he steals your food now. Not to mention all the other stuff he does to torment you.

Victor Morrison (your dad) - 40 years old, 9'1". Short black hair and brown eyes. He sits at home all day while your mom goes to work, doing nothing but eating, watching TV and, you suspect, jacking off, but you try not to think about that last one. He likes to think that since you're "the maid" in the family that that applies to home as well, and often leaves messes that you're expected to clean up.

Denise Morrison (your mom) - 39 years old, 7'11". Long black hair and green eyes. Even though she's rather short (relatively speaking) she still demands immense amounts of respect. She's the only one that can get your brother and dad to behave, and she likes you because unlike them you have a job and don't cause trouble. She works as a cleaning lady herself, so she knows what you're going through.


You weren't really sure going into a maid job that it would be the best fit for you, but when you thought about it there's a whole lot less people to deal with when you're cleaning for one family than, say, waitressing. The mother of that family, however, gives you quite a lot to deal with. She was the one who mandated that you wear the frilly outfit in the first place, but you still don't understand why.

You also suspect her of making attempts to torture you on the job. One day she sent you into the bathroom after she had just taken a shit, not even bothering to flush, and told you to clean it up. Like most toilets in town the bowl is big enough that you need to stand on the rim to clean it, and while you were up there you were knocked into the bowl by something you couldn't see and the lid just happened to fall closed, suspicious gently you might add. You yelled for help but nobody came for you, and the next time the lid opened it was her teenage son's bare ass being plopped down ready to take a shit on you. You thank God he heard you before he went, because what you had to clean up after him was even worse.

What will today bring?
145.title: Alyssa Morrison

choices: Getting ready for my party today.
1452.content:
You sigh, leaning against the door in your mom's massive SUV dwarfed by the massive passenger seat. It's Saturday again, which means yet another entire day of cleaning up after probably the richest, snobbiest, slobbiest family in town: the Kings. The long, hard hours and demeaning outfit are rough but you keep telling yourself the money is worth it. You've always wondered what the point of hiring a maid in a town that idolizes grossness is, but considering how much they pay you it's probably best not to ask.

"Feeling alright, hun?" your mom asks from the driver's seat, noticing your lack of energy. She might be big and fat like the King family but she's one of the few kind people in your life, and she's always been able to read you like a dessert menu.

"As good as I can on a Saturday," you shrug.

"I know, its rough. But at least for you this is temporary. You do this for a little while longer, get out of college, and I bet you'll be making twice as much money as these folks." You're glad your mom has such high hopes for your future beyond just being a maid, but whether you'll be able to reach those goals is another story.

Your mom pulls up to the large ornate gate emblazoned with large back to back K's and and rings the bell. A few moments later the gates open and you proceed down the long driveway to the huge King mansion. By normal standards the average house in Hershey looks like mansion, so this mansion looks more like a castle in size. It towers over your vehicle, casting a long shadow in the morning sun. Your mom pulls in to the roundabout at the front door and stops to let you out.

"Have a good day honey." She gives you an encouraging pat on the shoulder as you unbuckle your seatbelt.

"Thank Mom." You climb out of the car and approach the massive dark wood front doors. With no chance to reach the golden handles above you you jump to slap the doorbell and wait for someone to answer. After nearly five minutes a heavy set of footsteps from the other side of the door can be heard, before you appears probably your least favorite member of the household.

"Well good morning," Mia King says flatly. The platinum blond haired, blue eyed matriarch of the house looks down at you with a strange combination of a frown and a sneer. Her enormous frame, larger than your mother at 8'4" and white a bit heavier, is dressed in only a stained purple bath robe that's tied just tight enough to keep all the important bits covered; underneath it you're pretty sure she's naked. "Hope you don't mind that I was a little late. Oh, wait what am I saying, you don't care at all about wasting time do you?" You look at her confused, so she elaborates. "You were five minutes late. Again. I don't pay you to waste my time, understand girl?"

"Uh, yes, sorry," you reply, looking down at the floor.

"Who are you saying yes to, my feet?" she asks sternly. "If you're saying yes to cleaning them then have at it." She raises one massive leg while leaning on the door frame to put her fat foot right in your face.

"N-no, I was saying it to you," you stammer, averting your gaze from her unwashed bare foot.

"Then look at me when you speak. And address me properly," she orders, putting her foot back down. You slowly, nervously look up at her and watch her disgusting yellow teeth appear in her wide smile as you say exactly what she wants to hear.

"Yes ma'am."

"That's better. Now get in here and let's get you to work." She turns around and leads you into the house, revealing that her robe only covers half of her huge jiggling asscheeks that you have to watch bounce around in front of you. The massive posh mansion has remained very clean thanks to you, but you know exactly where all the filth will be hiding. "Today you can start with..."
1452.title: The Queen of the Kings

choices: Take the risk! Steal the money!
Play it safe. Keep working for the money!
14521.content:
“…assisting me in my bedroom upstairs.”

“Yes, Ma’am,” You groan. You very well what she means by “assisting”.

“And watch your tone!” Said Mrs. King. “I’m your boss. Not one of your fucking school friends. If I catch you talking like that again, I’m throwing you out on the street on your ass. Understand?”

“Yes, Ma’am,” You answer; making sure to hide your contempt this time.

“You’d better for your sake,” Said Mrs. King. “And bring me my breakfast before you go to my room. I expect you to have a full-course meal prepared and brought to me in twenty minutes.”

“Yes, Ma’am,” You say with a cheesy fake smile; fighting to keep overwhelming frustration off your face.

“Don’t have me waiting again or you’re fired,” Said Mrs. King. “Oh…one more thing, dear.”

You opened your mouth for another phony “yes, ma’am”, only for a startled shriek to take its place as Mrs. King’s giant hand grabs you by the hair and drives you into her half-covered rear end. You try to resist, but your hands just sink into her overinflated cheeks while your face is forced deeper and deeper into their foul cavernous depth. Mrs. King’s spacious bottom practically devours your upper torso, smearing you in wet and dried feces until you’re barely an inch away from her ample, hairy, wrinkled anus. You thrash about to get away, but her hand keeps you in place to watch her dirty puckered hole blow you a fetid kiss.

A loud, wet, bubbly fart ripples up your face and blows you out of Mrs. King’s butt like a cannonball. You fly across the Foyer until you come crashing down to the floor, nearly breaking a very expensive vase. You dare to take a breath, only to fly into a horrible coughing fit. With Mrs. King’s rancid waste slathering your face, your sense of smell is dominated by her haunting odor. It’s almost too much for your body to bear as your coughs barely leave room for air in your lungs.

“Remember that the next time you think about disrespecting me,” Mrs. King says as she lumbers towards the spacious Foyer stairs going up to the bedrooms. "Now pick your lazy ass up and fix my breakfast. If it's not in my room in seventeen minutes, you're fired."

It was SEVENTEEN minutes now? You start to complain, but more choughs skid up your throat to silence your argument. Not that it would've mattered. Mrs. King was already half-way up the stairs; muttering to herself about something.

Now with only sixteen minutes to save your job, you lift yourself back on your feet; resisting the annoying tickle at the back of your throat compelling you to cough your way back down on the floor. You rush out of the Foyer towards the kitchen, wondering how you're going to fix a full-course meal in so little time. Especially when a Mia King meal equaled several normal Hershey meals; which were already twice as big as a family portion. Or so you've gathered from watching TV.

You find the answer to your problems sitting in the middle of the King's massive kitchen. Arranged somewhat haphazardly on the immense table in the middle of the room was a breathtaking spread of breakfast foods. Piles of french toast, pancakes, bacon, muffins, biscuits, melon, cereal, and more spread across the surface with huge barrels filled with apple and orange juice.

"Oh, Christ! DANNY! How hard is it to wipe your ass before you..."

From the other side of the table, Samantha King steps away from her family's industrial-sized oven; carrying a plate of omelets with one hand and pinching her nose with the other. What's more, she's down here with her hair in a mess and not a single ounce of make-up on her chest. Just how long has she been working on all this food.

"Alyssa...you look like shit, girl," She says, bluntly.

"No thanks to your Mom," You say. "I think she got poop all the way up my-"

"Ew. Stop. Don't," Samantha warns while she sets the omelets down on the table. "I spent six hours cooking all this shit. Do not make me throw up all over it."

"You spent all night making this for me?" You say, feeling a soft warmth swell in your chest. For the first time that morning, a sincere smile spreads across your face. "I don't know what to-"

"You can thank me by washing your face off." Samantha snapped as she covered her curling lips. "I'm literally almost about to puke right now."

"Right...sorry," You say.

You make your way out of the kitchen and into the service porch. Passing between a long stretch of industrial-grade washing machines, you take off your uniform, lean over the edge of a solitary sink, turn on the faucet, squirt soap into your hands, and proceed to scrub the poop off your body. You probably could've spent a bit more time washing, but you only have eleven minutes to save your job. After two wipes with a towel you fished out of the laundry basket, you grab a spare maid uniform lying around and hurry back to the kitchen. You arrive to see Samantha flinging open a window before inhaling a loud breath of fresh air.

"So what made you decide to do all this?" You ask.

Samantha gives you a suspicious glance. "That was too quick, Did you make sure to wash everything off?" She asks as she inspects you from head to toe.

"Yes,"

Samantha raised an eyebrow. "You're sure?"

"Samantha, just answer the question. I've got ten minutes to get all this upstairs before I'm fired."

Samantha sighs. "You know how my Dad's been gone for like, ever?"

"Yeah," You affirm as you occupy yourself with a mechanism underneath the table. With a pull of a lever, a wheel sprouts from the furniture and drops to the floor. You continue your way around the table doing this to about twenty-four more levers. It's a very long table.

"Well a couple weeks ago, Mom decided enough was enough; and had the bright idea of hiring a detective,

"You Mom spied on your Dad?"

"How are you even surprised, Allie? She's batshit crazy!" Samantha said, throwing her hands up for emphasis. "It got even worse when the detective guy told her Dad's been cheating with a girl ten times skinnier than her."

"Oh no..." You mutter. If there was one thing you knew about Mrs. King, it's that she hated skinny people with a passion. Mr. King going for someone smaller than her must've made her absolutely nuclear,

"Ooohoho yes," Samantha nodded while crossing her arms. She had a harried look about her as she continued her story. "She's been on the warpath ever since. She went and swallowed up all the female maids before you got here."

A shiver raced down your spine. Being eaten by Mrs. King was the number one cause of early retirement among servants at the King household. It's why you had to work extra hard to keep her happy, even though you've never seen her smile the entire time you worked for her. Though on the bright side, you weren't really that close to any of the staff.

"What happened to the butlers?" You ask a bit nervously.

"They're all upstairs," Said Samantha. "Mom thought as long as Dad's having an affair, she's allowed to have as many as she wants."

"Oh, Gross1"

"You don't get to use that word, Little Miss Skidmark," Samantha teased. "Anyway, I thought she'd try and pull some BS on you, so I decided I'd help you keep your job."

With the last wheel dropped, you rise to your feet to face Samantha. "What would I do without you, Sam?"

"Just get this stuff upstairs." Samantha yawned. "I"m gonna pass out on my bed before mom decides she wants to scream at me again."

With a nod, you move past Samantha to get behind the table. With a good push, you start moving the table towards a large golden service elevator at the far end of the kitchen.

"Allie, wait," Samantha calls after you. "Are you you sure you washed your face good?"

"Yes, Sam," You say a bit sharply. "How many times are you going to keep-"

You suddenly silenced as a pair of soft lips press against your own. Your heart flutters as you feel Samantha's arms wrap around your back to pull you closer into her chest. You surprise disappears almost instantly as you close your eyes to envelop yourself in the taste of her mouth and the scent of her hair. You stay embraced for a good while before you finally decide to break away.

"Geeze...It's been a while since we've done that," says Samantha.

"Yeah, that was really good." You say. "Maybe I should've actually cleaned my face before you did that."

"Fuck you!" Samantha exclaims half-jokingly as she socking you in the shoulder. "...seriously though, you don't have to keep putting yourself through this, you know."

"Sam, we talked about this," You sigh. "I'm only doing this until your Mom pays enough money for us to skip town, and make a decent life for ourselves...far away from Hershey."

"And I keep telling you there's an easier way," Says Samantha. "I can just steal the money we need out of her purse. I do it all the time when I need to buy actual food."

"I still think it's too risky,"

"It's no riskier than working for my Mom, Allie. She only pays her servants well so they don't fuck off after she humiliates them or eats them. I don't want to see either happening to you anymore."

You take a real deep sigh before speaking again. "You're really okay with stealing a million dollars from your Mom?"

"If it means leaving this fat fucking town and keeping you safe? I'll do it right now. The two of us don't belong in this town anyway" Samantha says. Then she puts her hand on your shoulder. "...but if stealing bothers you that much, I'll let you do it your way. Just keep in mind: I can't always be there to save you from Mom. So really think about it before you turn my idea down."
14521.title: The bedrooms.

choices: How Farah got her groove back
Trevor and Sydney hit the town
15.content:
Farah Nielson - 25 years old 5' 3'': Once upon a time, you couldn't go more than five seconds without being reminded about Farah. Singing several chart-topping tunes on the radio, staring in four movies every year, appearing constantly on tour, billboards, magazines, beauty products, even her own cereal, it seemed that there was no escaping Farah's Fire(TM).

Or at least that's how it was before the incident that cost her everything: In the middle of singing the hook of her most popular song "Love is like an Atom Bomb" in concert, in front of the entire world, Farah accidentally broke wind. As a flow of gas quickly exited her that night, so did her popularity. With her image of perfection and majesty shattered, even her most dedicated of fans abandoned her in droves. After the initial week of media fallout from her public snafu, Farah's face slowly started to fade from the public consciousness.

Fearing obscurity, Farrah was desperate to find a way to reclaim her stardom and put that terrible incident behind her. That's when she received an email from an old modeling friend she hadn't heard from in years: Melody. The email contained a plane ticket and an invitation to sit on a panel of judges for a beauty pageant in a town called "Hershey".

A local beauty pageant sounded far beneath her, but Farrah couldn't exactly afford to be picky. Besides, the town's chocolate was supposed to be pretty good.


Trevor Steedman - 28 years old 5' 5": When coming home from a camping trip with his girlfriend, Sydney, Trevor's car suddenly decides to break down in the town of Hershey. With the local mechanic on vacation for the day, Trevor and Sydney have no choice but to check into a hotel room for the night.

Well, as long as they're stuck here, they might as well explore the town. There outta be something here that's interesting.


Jesse Rhodes - 36 years old 5' 7": After divorcing her husband, Jesse is looking forward to a fresh new start in a town she barely even knows. She loves Hershey so far; everybody is so friendly to her. Especially her new boss, Lana Santos, who stopped by to visit Jesse's new home with an armful of delicious food. She was disappointed to find out she'd gained a few pound the first day she became a citizen, but she's sure she can get it off with a couple days of jogging. Though for right now, she's got to get ready for work at Mrs. Santos' corporate headquarters.


Michelle Rhodes - 16 years old, 5': Michelle didn't like the sound of Hershey when her mom told her she got a job there, and she definitely doesn't like it now that she lives there. Everything smells terrible, it's populated by sweaty blimps, and she can feel herself teeter on the verge of cardiac arrest if she even looks at the food.

But the worst thing about this town is one Isabella Santos: an overinflated spoiled brat who is the hottest girl in Michele's high school for whatever reason. Isabella favorite passtime is bullying Michelle with her friends; mocking her utter disgust with this town by putting her in the grossest situations. It's absolute torture for Michelle, but she has to no choice but to endure it. If she fights back or tells anyone that Isabella is bullying her, her tormenter will convince her mom to fire Michelle's.



Who's story will you follow?
15.title: Newcomers

choices: Lana needs you to accompany her somewhere.
153.content:
Monday morning. Today's the day you start your new job at The Adipose company (humorously they call it TACo for short). You've been snacking on the delicious food you boss brought you in a welcome basket since last week, it's just so delicious! There's muffins, brownies, cookies, loads of chocolate candy (according to Lana this town is famous for their chocolate), and a few weird items you might never eat, but that's okay since there's still plenty you will.

Aside from the few extra pounds you've gained recently you're certainly rocking 36 years old. You've kept yourself fairly slim, you still fill out a C-cup (they've been feeling a bit snug actually), your long brown hair is still silky smooth. Once you've really settled down here you're sure you won't have any trouble finding a new man.

You're leaning against the kitchen counter in your light blue sports bra and matching shorts digging into a huge, delicious, fluffy chocolate muffin big enough to hold with two hands when your daughter Michelle comes out to leave for school. She used to dress herself so nicely for school before, but today like many days she's only going out in a t-shirt and sweatpants. You've been meaning to ask her about that.

"Isn't that a little counter-productive?" she comments as she walks out of the hall bathroom. You look down at yourself to see you're wearing your running gear but also munching on sweets. With your stomach exposed by the sports bra the pounds you've gained are pretty obvious.

"Don't worry about it," you wave off her remark over a mouthful muffin. "I'm going for a run right after this."

"Okay, but haven't you said that for the past, like, week?"

"...Well, this time it's for real!" Your daughter is right, you haven't committed to your runs at all since you've moved here. "Things... have come up, that's all." Laziness came up, that's for sure.

"Mhmm..." Michelle looks at you dubiously, but the clock says it's time for her to leave so she can't guilt trip you any longer. You give her a hug goodbye and she walks out to the bus stop. Once she's gone you scarf down the rest of the massive muffin in a rather unladylike manner, followed by an equally unladylike belch.

BUUUUURRRP

"Phew, excuse me," you say to yourself, trying to fan away the smell. Your stomach feels a bit heavy with all that muffin inside, but now it's time to earn it. You grab your keys and move towards the door when suddenly your stomach begings gurgling like crazy. Are you having a bad reaction to the muffin? Is it just gas? You've never heard it make sounds like this. You stop for a moment to let it calm down but as you do you catch the scent of that delicious chocolate from the basket. You remember trying one and had to force yourself to go outside to keep from eating too much more.

"Well, I don't think I can go out for a run like this, so maybe I'll just go back and sit in the kitchen," you reason with yourself. You take a seat at the kitchen table and let your belly sort itself out. Meanwhile that basket of goodies looks over you, filled with delicious food. "I mean I can't go anywhere, maybe I'll just sneak one more cookie, I'll run it off in a few minutes anyway." You reach into the basket and pull out a monstrous chocolate chip cookie bigger than your face, with chocolate chunks that could fit in your palm. It smells divine and makes you drool just looking at it.

It also calms your stomach.

As soon as your swallow your first bite your stomach calms down. Is that it? you wonder, were you just still hungry? If your body wants more food, who are you to deny it? You dig into the rest of the huge treat, savoring the rich chocolate and soft dough as both explode with flavor in your mouth. When that's gone you realize you don't necessarily feel full. It's strange considering how much you just ate, but maybe just one more treat couldn't hurt...

Suddenly you jump as you feel a pair of fat fingers with long nails apply a quick but noticeable pinch on your right butt cheek. “Ooh, firm.” Beatrice giggles before setting you down. “So, yeah, I'm your auntie Beatrice. You can just call me Bea if you want.”

The only thing you wanna call her is crazy, what kind of greeting was that?! You can understand being excited to meet someone but you're pretty sure you're not supposed to grab your nephew's ass. Looking down at yourself you realize her body oils got all over you, and that part of the stink emanating off of her is now coming off you as well.

“Uh, nice to meet you,” you say trying your hardest to be as polite as possible.

“Nice to meet you too. How's Lori doing, did she ever put some meat on those bones of hers?" She's talking about your mom, who certainly has not gained weight comparable to hers. You just tell her she's eating well. "Good! She never did eat enough. Now then, let's get a move on! We can get better acquainted back at my house, and we've got a long drive ahead of us.” Your gigantic aunt turns around to leave and you follow her massive jiggling ass out of the airport, however things get a little interesting when you get to the main doors. They obviously weren't made to accommodate people larger than full grown hippos, and as a result your extra wide aunt gets stuck trying to squeeze through.

"Oops, here we go again," she giggles, telling you this probably happened on the way in too. "Aaron, hun, use those strong arms of yours and gimme a little push, would you?"

"Wouldn't it be easier to pull you instead?" You ask, hoping to not have to go near her ass.

"Oh, hun you'll throw your back out like that," she dismisses you immediately. "There's plenty more to grab onto back there, just one good shove should do it. Just ram me good." You really don't like how she says that last part, especially how she grins when she says it. You go back inside where her ass is caught, the giant wall of leopard print fabric towering over you. Just one quick push, you tell yourself. You try not to think of how many people are staring at you as you as you place a hand on each of your aunt's ass cheeks and push as hard as you can while she pushes on the wall around the door. Initially your hands just sink into her fat, but soon you feel her start to move. You keep pushing harder and harder until...

FFRAAAAAAAPPPPPPPPPPTTTTTTTT

As your aunt pops free of the doorway she unleashes a horrible fart right in your face as if it had propelled her out like a rocket. The sound echoes through the entire airport and draws everyone's attention to you, the boy who took the brunt of it as you gag and cough. As soon as you notice everyone looking you book it outside, making a note to go to any other airport when you leave here. Your aunt doesn't even seem to notice what she did.

You almost want to believe this is all a trick, that your real aunt will show up soon and get you away from this behemoth, but as you get to her car you realize that's not gonna happen. Her car, by the way, is modeled like a Prius but is even bigger than a Hummer, dwarfing all other cars around it. She must have had this custom made or something. You put your stuff in the trunk and go to sit in the back seat, but right as you open the door a mountain of pizza boxes and other food wrappers spills out on top of you.

“Oh you probably don't wanna sit back there,” your aunt warns you too late as she squeezes into the driver’s seat. “I tend to snack on the road sometimes so I need someplace to throw the trash.”

Now covered in grease and old food bits you climb into the passenger seat only to find Beatrice's girth is actually spilling into it. Even sitting as close to the door as possible her love handles still find a way to reach you across center console. The whole interior smells like sweat and garbage. This really is gonna be a long ride.

“Oh yeah, could you pop open the glove box for me cutie?” she asks as she starts up the car. You're a bit uncomfortable with your aunt calling you “cutie” but you do as she asks, and discover that the glove box unfolds into a tray holding a half eaten large pizza loaded with meat toppings. “Like I said, always gotta bring snacks for the road.” She reaches over and grabs a couple of slices, her arm fat hanging like a wing as she reaches for them before taking a big bite out of both and chewing them noisily, diving with one hand and stuffing her face with the other. "Mmmm mmmm," she practically moans over the mouthful, drool spilling from the corners of her mouth, "I swear, meat lovers pizzas were made for me. I just love hot juicy meat in my mouth, you know?" She looks over at you with the same grin from earlier before offering you one if the remaining slices.

“I'm not really hungry, but thanks,” you tell her, sinking further into your seat even though there was no getting away from her.

"Well alright, more for me," she chuckles, stuffing the remainder of the slices in her hand into her mouth and, before she even finishes chewing them, she grabs the last few pieces in front of you and shoves them in as well. The loud squishy sounds of her chewing it all up make you cringe, yet you can't help but stare in morbid curiosity as she swallows essentially half a pizza like it's nothing, grease and sauce dripping from her plump lips down her chins.

UUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPP

"Mmmm, I love getting to taste it a second time," she belches as she tosses the empty box in the back seat. The already nasty air in the car is suddenly overwhelmed by the powerful stench of pizza and whatever else she's had to eat today. "So, you excited to start at a new school? I know it can be a little scary starting all over again."

"Yeah, I guess," you reply, trying to look out the window and focus on anything else.

"Well, good you should be. I'll be honest with you, this school's a little tough, but I'm sure a handsome guy like you will have no trouble making friends." You certainly hope your school life goes well here, because home life is certainly going to be interesting with this woman. You stare out the window at empty fields for the remainder of the car ride as you drive through what seems to be the middle of nowhere. Then you notice a sign coming up that reads "Welcome to Hershey, The Biggest Small Town in America". At least this ride is almost over. The fields begin to be replaced by houses, but something is off about them; they're huge! They're not mansions by any means, just normal looking houses that are way bigger than they're supposed to be. Even single story ranchers look massive.

"Uhh, Aunt Bea? Is everything here supposed to be, like, big?"

"Huh? Oh right, I guess nobody told you. We like to live large around here, so they made everything to accommodate us. Barely any doors to get stuck in around here, that's for sure," she laughs. You're about to ask what "living large" means when you spot other people walking down the street. Just about all of them are as big as Beatrice, hundreds of pounds of fat on all of them, adults, teens, even kids (or who you can only assume are kids) are all enormous! What kind of crazy town is this?!
1552.title: Aaron Jacob

choices: Beatrice has her way with you.
The doorbell rings and saves you.
15521.content:
As you drive further into town you only see more and more big fat people walking around; sure there's a few healthy people mixed in, but they're far outnumbered by the overweight giants. And just like you the skinny people look like children compared to everything in this town; the buildings, the people, even the actual children. It's especially strange to see families with kids that are already 6' tall while the parents are breaking 8'. They're all shopping for new clothes, walking into restaurants, or just sitting around threatening to crush the publicly available seating.

Eventually Beatrice pulls into a parking lot behind a pizza place situated under some apartments. You're thankful to get out of her stinking car, but you have a feeling the real suffering hasn't even begun yet. You grab your suitcases and follow your aunt's gargantuan bouncing behind into the building where she leads you to one of many elevators. The one good thing about this town being huge is that there's plenty of space in here for you to be as far away from your aunt as possible. That is until an enormous family of three comes up to share the ride. As they file in the open space in the elevator car disappears almost instantly, and you find yourself pinned to the wall by the fat sweat pants clad ass of their teenage daughter. Beatrice doesn't even seem to notice.

"Honey are you sure you didn't eat too much?" the teen's mom asks as the elevator slowly begins to climb to the top floor, audibly struggling under the weight of all these land whales.

"Mom I'm fine," her daughter replies in a voice that suggests this is not the first time she's asked. "I've eaten way more than fifty burritos with my friends, I just wasn't that hungry today." Suddenly you hear some concerning gurgling noises from somewhere inside her huge body.

FFFFFFFFFRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPTTTTTTTTT

A long, hot, disgusting blast of air completely unfiltered by the sweatpants slams you in the face right at the moment you're taking a breath. It feels like your lungs are shriveling up as you choke on the noxious gas, and it's so potent you can taste it.

"Haha, that's my girl!" her father... compliments her? Why would someone congratulate a fart, especially one they're trapped in an elevator with? Turns out it's only the first of many to come, as the elevator takes a full 10 minutes struggling to move what's probably a combined 1 ton of fat up 8 floors, each minute feeling like an hour in your position. Luckily the family gets off the elevator before you and your aunt so you're not crushed the entire time, but much of the pungent fart cloud remains inside for the last two floors. When you finally get to your floor you run out of that box of stink as fast as you can.

"Ahhh, home sweet home," your aunt sighs as she leads you into her apartment. It's not as bad as you were imagining, but it's still pretty bad. The first thing you notice are the pillars: giant towers of cardboard pizza boxes stacked up to various heights all around the living room emanating the smell of old pizza grease. Obviously she orders from the place downstairs quite often. Piled up in a corner where a trashcan probably once stood are empty 2 liter soda bottles.

"So you uhh... live... like this?" you ask as you step inside. You don't want to be rude but you're just in shock.

"Yup," Beatrice says cheerfully. "It's usually just me here so it's nice and cozy."

"But I mean like... with all this trash?"

"Oh, that." She waves her hand dismissively, "I've been meaning to throw some of these away for months but I started using them for things, so now I don't know which once are trash and which ones have a purpose," she laughs. "The TV remotes are in one of the ones by the couch, I just never remember which one." Speaking of her furniture, as if her disregard for garbage wasn't a clue she doesn't seem to care about interior design. Her couch looks at least 10 years out of date, gray with faded floral print on it, and doesn't match a single other thing in the room. All the other seating in the room consists of large bean bag chairs of varying sizes in front t of the huge wide screen TV. Her china cabinet is full of tacky knick knacks and Coke and Pepsi branded glasses. Nothing seems to match anything else.

"So that's that. And then over here we have the kitchen," Beatrice continues with the tour, lumbering past the pizza pillars somehow without bumping into a single one. "I don't really cook much, don't have to with the pizza place right downstairs. But there's always leftovers in the fridge when you're hungry." She opens then massive industrial sized fridge to reveal exactly what you were expecting, more pizza and soda. Somehow this seems to be the most orderly thing in her house, as the boxes are all nicely stacked with the topping check boxes facing outward, and seem to be ordered by them. You see tons of meat lovers, along with some less desirable combinations like mushroom and anchovies. There even seem to be dessert pies in there, huge cookies the size of pizzas. Before the door shuts again Beatrice grabs a two liter bottle of Coke for herself and almost instantly chugs down half of it in a single swig.

"And finally, let's get you-- BUUUUURRRRRRRPPP --situated in your room," your humongous host belches. She takes you down the hall past what your sense of smell is telling you must be the bathroom; you're not certain because the door is closed but there's still a distinct smell of sewage as you pass by. "That's my bedroom in there," she points to the room on the opposite side of the hall from yours. You don't stop to stare too long but it looks like even more of a mess than the living room. Bedsheets thrown all over, clothes and underwear littering the floor, it looks as though a tornado just blew through it. "So if you're ever having a hard time sleeping you can always come sleep with me," she grins.

"Uhh, thanks?" You're really not sure how to respond to all these advances she keeps making. She leads you into the guest room which is actually fairly clean, the only things on it are a closet and a bed that comes up to your chin.

"Hup!" As you're setting down your stuff you hear Beatrice grunt and look up in time to see her fling her massive self onto your bed, shaking the whole room in the process. As she does this you find it hard to tell where her fat stops and the bed begins as all of it is jiggling together. "See, it's a water bed," she giggles, which explains the jiggling. You're surprised her weight didn't pop it just now. "Come on up and feel how comfy it is. There's definitely room for two..."

Although you're sure it'll give her more ammo for hitting on you, you're also hoping it'll get her out of your room faster so you climb on up and lay on the bed, keeping your distance from her. "Yeah I guess it is pretty comfy," you say honestly. You just want to sleep until you can move out of this place.

"Oh you can't be comfortable all the way over there," your aunt coos. Suddenly a large hand reaches over and grabs your midsection, and you're dragged across the bed until you feel what feels like a much warmer water bed pressed against your back, even though you know it's Beatrice. She pulls you in close, and you're pretty sure if she pulls you too close you'll just disappear into her fat, but she stops once you're snugly trapped between her large hot breasts with your head sticking out of her cleavage. "Mmmm, see how much better this is? And isn't it great how bouncy this is?" You suddenly find yourself in the dark and struggling to breathe as your aunt rolls on top of you, squashing you into the jiggly bed and her equally jiggly chest. She then starts humping you to make the bed and her body bounce around you as if you were enveloped in the water bed entirely. "You don't get this kind of bounciness with a regular mattress," she laughs before rolling off of you as if that was completely acceptable.

"Ah... This reminds me of when I was a little girl and slept with a teddy bear," she sighs as she holds you close. "But you're a lot cuter and cuddlier." With your torso covered in boob flesh she decides to cuddle you closer by putting her fat hand over your waist, but you both jump in surprise when she presses against something hard tenting the front of your shorts. You were hoping she wouldn't notice but at the same time you're certainly not lacking in that department do it would've been hard to hide. Although nothing your aunt has done today has been attractive to you whatsoever, you can't help that on the most basic biological level being pressed into big soft warm tits is arousing. "Oooh... You're a lot bigger than my teddy bear, too," Bea says in a low, seductive voice, gently placing her hand back on your crotch. Although she seems to still be trying to play it off as pulling you close to her, you can clearly feel her huge sausage fingers gently massaging your groin. You hate how good it feels.

"What do you say we really test this bed out, big boy...?" the huge horny woman whispers in your ear. Her light petting is quickly getting heavier, and you can feel her latching her thumb onto the waistband of your shorts ready to pull them down. "Let's make this whole apartment bounce..."

“What’s the place than, aunt Beatrice?”

“Oh this great place ten minutes out from here! Food n’ Fusions! They have the most delicious and creative food combos around! Sweet Potato and Chicken stuffed Turkey! Fish wrapped in bacon and covered in butter sauce with potato chip garnishing! Anything your mind can imagine eating, it’s there hun!” Beatrice salivated, with a stream of drool globing down her fatty neck and disappearing down her cleavage as she pictured what you found stomach churning food stuffs in her mind. For what sounded like a fast food restaurant to you seems to be so this town's equivalent of fine dining.
As you stared up at the truly grand scale of the eatery, you absentmindedly followed your aunt as she walked to the entrance, the gigantic wooden doors, that you hesitate to even claim you could even move, swung open by your Beatrice’s flabby arms to reveal what you could only describe as the ultimate tribute to gluttony.

“Hello Ma’am! Welcome to Food N’ Fusions!” Welcomed the hostess kindly, flashing a smile as she looked down at some papers.

“Good choice!” The hostess chirped, gesturing to a waitress to take you to your table.

She looked a few years older than you, with a similar outfit to he hostess, a white dress shirt even more stained with sweat from both her pits and large, E sized breasts and several button undone to accommodate her belly that was flimsily covering by a black apron, and the pair of tattered black jeans that seemed fit to burst from her massive hips and ass that was nearly as great as your aunt's, if not more wide. As you crane your neck to look up at her as she led you and Beatrice to your table you see a of frizzy red hair, a smiling, pudgy freckles face with green eyes that kept glancing down at you from her several feet she had on you and looking away quickly, her eyes nervously looking to a booth. “Here we are! My name is Fiona and I’ll be your waitress!” The waitress finally greeted, gesturing to the booth, where, to her surprise, had a massive drink spill left in the dead center of the table!”

“Oh don’t worry! We’re in no worry!” Beatrice smiled, moving between you and Fiona, giving you an wanted face to belly contact with you aunt as your face skidmarked across it and leaving a thin vale of sweat against your face, and she takes a seat in one of the booth seats, taking up nearly all of space with her girth alone.

following her lead, you take a seat at the opposite side of the booth, only to immediately feel the room temp, sticky feeling of a white substance that stuck to your hand and left a clear residue as you put your hands on seat. “Oh, i’ll clean it right up!” She smiled, seeing the spot you mentioned immediately and, like you weren't even there, squished herself into the space between the you and the table, and pent over you to clean it, smashing you into the girth of her gut and breasts, the movement of her muscles massaging you body and slathering you with her body odor and sweat as it dripped off her and soaked you, bringing you into a silent horror as your attempts to speak were caught between her folds and didn't seem to even phase her in the slightest.

The distinct odor of methane lacing the fabric so thoroughly all you could think was how long it would her to move.

“Can I start you with a drink Ma’am? A gallon of soda perhaps?” she asked sweetly, holding out a notepad and waited for your Aunt’s answer with a customer service smile on her freckled face.

“Yes, we’ll just have a gallon of Orange Soda!”

“Excellent! Please go to the food bar to pick out sides and I’ll be back with your drink!” Fiona smiled, scribbling down the simple drink and tucked her pad away, giving you a sense of relief as she began to turn to leave. “Oh, Here comes that cheese wheel pizza I ate!” Fiona grinned, pointing her butt outward, completely covering your face in the strained fabric of her jeans and fill your nose with the old scent of her past gassy outbursts, something that quickly changed as what you feared most slammed against you…

PPPPPPHHHHHHHSSSSSSSSSSSTTTTTTTT

15522.title: An Average Lunch In Slob Town

155222.content:
You decided to just wait, taking the time to suck in what little fresh, food enhanced air you can and recuperate physically and mentally before having to deal with your Aunt the rest of the night.

These minutes of breathing relief were soon shattered, however, as your nostrils were first to be alerted to the familiar, sour odor of your waitress Fiona coming around the corner.

“Here’s your drink Ma’am...oh she’s gone!” Fiona began, placing a massive pitcher of the orange soda your aunt had ordered for the two of you, the implications of sharing this drink not exactly sitting well in your already addled stomach and mind.

“Yeah my aunt booked it to the bar as soon as you left...” you let out a light chuckle, looking up at the large set woman nervously after being quiet intimate with her ass not too long ago.

“Oh well I’m not too surprised, she seemed pretty hungry...oh here are your menus!” Fiona grinned, placing a unusually thick menu book down on both sides of the table, which you quickly began to flip through the laminated pages to see a truly bizarre list of foods they offered here. All the dishes Beatrice listed off were there, and ones you genuinely found odd and truly gross: Ice cream loaded rich turkey cake, Chocolate covered full meat kebabs, barbecue sauce, ranch and truffle coated Poutine, and numerous other insane dishes you’d never even consider real, much less be able to actually eat!

“Umm...what’s the smallest dish you have Fiona?” You whimpered, deciding to give up on the menu and hoping a suggestion would better suit you.

“Huh...well I guess that’d either be the small Cheese Wheel Pizza, It’s where they use an entire cheese wheel, put a lot of dough on it, put tomato sauce and more cheese on top, and then bake it! Or maybe the universal rice bowl, it’s basically as much every rice variety there is, along with a few different kinds of noodles, in a bowl filled with butter and garlic salt!” She listed, her chubby mouth watering as she thought about those foods as she explained them to you.

Despite her obvious love of these foods, you found them less than mouth watering. With the “pizza” sounding way to much cheese to really enjoy and the rice sounding like you’d still have an issue eating it despite it being in Fiona’s “small” category.

“Uh I’ll get the rice bowl I guess, and could I get a drink of my own? Sprite if you have any...” you groaned in defeat, at least making an effort to make sure you’ll be able to have your own drink and avoid something unfortunate with your aunt.

“Of course! And do you know when your aunt is gonna be back?” Fiona asked, scribbling down your order and looking down at you past her massive tits, clearly needing the other part of the order.

“Who knows, she will probably stack as much food as she can before coming back...” you shrugged, hardly knowing her enough to make a good guess.

“Well, I think I’ll just sit here with you till she comes back, I don’t think the boss will mind if I sit down for a few to wait to finish your order...” Fiona yawned, shuffling over to the opposite side of the booth and dropping her jean clad ass into the padded seats, sending you a foot up off your butt into the air as her entire weight crashed down all at once.

“Ahh glad to finally sit down!” The waitress bellowed satisfactorily, a grin across her freckled face as she began to look at you with a genuinely nice smile.

“So, what’s your name anyway?” She finally asked,

“Uhh Aaron, I just moved here today...” you answered plainly, surprised to have your first real conversation since you’ve landed in this fat infused town.

“Oh that explains why you didn’t know what to eat! Well trust me when I say this is the best town in the world! My mom and sisters moved down here with me when I was 12 and I’ve loved every day of it!” Fiona laughed triumphantly, throwing her open palm into her gut and letting a jello like ripple through her fatty flesh despite the apron covering it, much to your hidden disgust.

“Uh that’s great. what about your sisters?” You asked, trying not to pay attention to her stomach movements and just keep the conversation going.

“Oh they’re all doing great! A few are in college, the rest are in high school! I just graduated myself. All of them are living their best life in the best of shape! Well...except for Irina, she’s skinnier than you actually! But we’re trying to get her on the right track...” she explained before trailing off at the last sentence, her face losing her smile as her eyes locked on something behind your side of the booth.

You were curious what she was looking at, leaning a slight bit closer in to ask her what she was looking at , only to watch in astonishment as she very suddenly shot forward, slamming her meaty hands onto your table in a thud and her massive, apparently braless, tits swinging up with her like a guillotine, slamming against your leaning in race with a fatty, sweat coated slam that stunned you for a brief second as your body was forced back into your seat from the sudden shock of force!

“Molly! Get your ass over here!” She half shouted, a streak of red rage running in her cheeks and eyes as she looked at who you assumed was Molly from across the way.

“Yeah yeah, what is it Fiona?” Said a surprisingly smooth, yet tired voice from behind you.

Your eyes followed the sound of her voice to finally seeing the site of Molly. She was, admittedly, prettier then you’d expected, a thinner face, with a sharp nose, gentle chestnut eyes, sun tanned skin, lip gloss coated lips and a head of long blond hair tied into a braid. With that included, she was still as tall as Fiona, as in towering over you. Wearing a slightly modified uniform then her counterpart, with a white dress shirt that was coated in both sweat and various bright food stains, which just barely covered her modest bust when compared to Fiona, but had serious issue covering her bloated pot belly that seemed to groan and vibrate all on its own. Going down, where Fiona was wearing black jeans, Molly was wearing stretchy black leggings that were practically painted onto her truly massive lower body, her hips being nearly twice as large as your aunt’s and twice as thick, a true lower whale of a woman!

“Where were you? You were supposed to clean this table! I had to clean it while taking there drink orders!” Fiona growled harshly, gesturing over you for Molly as she lectured her, who didn’t even seem to acknowledge you and simply looked at her coworker with a deadpan expression.

“Well table 14 left an entire platter of cheese steaks uneaten! It’s apart of the job to eat the food left at the table remember!” Molly grinned, rubbing her stomach satisfyingly and licking her fat lips with food based ecstasy.

"Hi, how can I help you?" A cheery, chubby faced receptionist greets you as you step inside.

"Hi there, we're here to speak to the principal about registering my nephew for classes," Beatrice replies.

The receptionist leans into her intercom, "Ms. Sizemore, you have visitors here for registration." A few moments later you hear a door open down the hall. Now originally Beatrice had been the largest person you'd ever met, but this lady blows that record completely out of the water. The office, quite like everything else in this town, almost doesn't feel real. Everything is so massive it's like an amusement park. It doesn't sound like the adults are going to be coming in just yet, maybe you can just see what it's like to sit in this thing. "...it's nothing too crazy, just a few forms to fill out," Ms Sizemore explains to Beatrice. "Hmm, didn't Aaron come in here already?" Beatrice wonders aloud, noticing you're missing. "Maybe he went to the bathroom or something, it was a long trip."

"That's okay, he doesn't need to be here for you to sign these," Caroline tells her. "And I hope you don't mind me saying, but he has got to be one of the cutest boys I've seen come into this school in a long time. Is he your son?"

"Oh no, he's my nephew. No direct relation," Beatrice corrects her quickly. "But he really is the cutest isn't he? When I first saw him at the airport I couldn't believe what I was seeing." Yeah, neither could you, you think to yourself. If these women weren't gigantic land whales, and one of them not your aunt, it would be pretty hot to hear them talk about you like this though.

"Generally I've never really looked at skinny boys but him... I could make an exception," Caroline giggles.

"It must just be something about that age," says Beatrice. "They turn 15, they start getting some muscle on them and just... mmmm." The two women continue to giggle like they're students here instead of adults.

"Well I think he'll fit in very well here," Caroline continues, "and if he does ever feel a bit left out, let him know he can always come to me. I can help him feel more... comfortable." You really hope the wetness you feel coming through her panties is just sweat.
