"Hey mister, is that your girlfriend?" The older kid asks, a maybe 12 year old boy in a blue bathing suit.

"How come she's so fat?" The other kid who you assume is his younger sister asks. She's wearing a purple one piece and looks around 10.

"Shhh, keep it down," you warn them in a hushed voice, worried what Isabella might do if she's awakened so soon. "Shes not my girlfriend."

"Is she your sister?" The boy tries again.

"No, no, she's just a friend from school," you tell him more clearly. "Now get out of here."

"Ohh okay. I've never seen somebody as fat as her," the boy says, giggling.

"Yeah, can we climb on her like you? It looks like fun!" the younger sister chimes in.

"Uhh, no you really don't wanna do that." You've got a good feeling Isabella has about as much tolerance for kids as she showed for adults. Your warning doesn't deter the kids though as they begin to scale her fat legs. "Guys seriously, you need to get out of here. If she wakes up she's gonna be really mad."

"I bet she can't even get up by herself," the boy laughs. "If she gets mad we can just walk away and I bet she wouldn't be able to catch us."

"Woah, she's so squishy." His sister notes, pushing her hand into the teen's thigh fat. "Maybe her butt is like a trampoline!"

"No! Seriously, get off of her!" You hiss, but these kids still don't listen. You try to crawl toward them without disturbing Isabella too much, but these kids are doing ten times worse. Each of them stands up on one of her huge butt cheeks and starts jumping up and down on them! "Stop!"

"It is like a trampoline!" The boy giggles as he bounces on the mound of butt fat.

"Yeah! It's kinda stinky though," his sister concurs. Isabella's continued snoring tells you she hasn't been woken up yet, but you can only push this luck so far. You're about to scold the kids again when the older boy slips on some of Isabella's ass sweat and his leg slides directly into the deep crevice between the cheeks. "Woah!"

"Oh shit..." you curse under your breath. You crawl a little faster now hoping you can save this kid.

"What's wrong bro?" The little girl asks, stopping her bouncing.

"My foot got stuck! And it feels like I'm sinking!" He tries to prop himself up with his hands and stand up with his spare foot, but that too slips into the crack. "I need help!" he cries out. He reaches out to his little sister who pulls with all her might on his hands, but to all three of your horror he only sinks in further!

Once you get close enough to grab the boy's hand both you and his sister grab on and pull with all your might, but Isabella's asshole is too strong even for both of you.

FFFFRRRRRRRRRRRTTTTTTTTTTTTTT

Suddenly a horrible fart erupts from the huge girl's hungry rectum, the noxious fumes making your eyes water and turning the much less experienced kids physically green with nausea. You were hoping it would push the boy out of the hole a little bit, but of course it only pulls him in up to his waist as her anus expands to expel the gas. The little girl tries to tug one more time at her brother's hand but loses her balance and topples backward into the sand with a yelp. You then feel yourself losing your balance too; not from nausea, but because the ground is shifting under you.

As you topple into the sand you look up to see Isabella standing up and yawning, and not looking all too happy. She's also forgotten to tie her top back on, letting her tits hang freely. Her body has left a deep imprint in the sand where she was sleeping. "What's going on here?" she grumbles sleepily. "I was just having the best dream about taking a nice big shit. Who woke me up?"

"Lady, please don't let your butt eat my brother!" The little girl pleads, prompting Isabella to turn and face her.

"'Don't let...'?" The groggy behemoth reaches back to her massive ass and feels the top of the boy's head sticking out of her crack. Instead of helping, she just starts laughing hysterically. "Oh so that's what I felt! Hahaha! Nope, sorry kid, pretty sure he's a goner." As she says this she pushes on the top of the boy's head to speed up the process. He cries out briefly before vanishing between the huge cheeks, her ass letting out another wet PHHHHHHHRRRRTTTTTTT as if burping after its meal. She then turns around to show the little girl, bearing her filthy asshole to her with no signs of the little boy. "See? All gone." However, you notice her belly is bulging out and has begun shaking around now; could she really have pulled him that far in?

"And now there's just you," Isabella continues, stepping towards the little girl. She tries to scramble away but the fat teen she once thought immobile snatches her up with ease, grabbing her by the back of her bathing suit.

"Please don't put me in your butt lady!" The girl cries. "I don't wanna go in there!"

"Ohh, you don't wanna go in there?" Isabella asks softly, to which the tearful girl shakes her head furiously. "Okay then, I won't put you in there." The child looks a little relieved for a second until Isabella lifts her high up in the air over her head. "I'll put you in the other way."

"What?! No no no! Please don't eat me lady!"

"Sorry kid, maybe next time don't fucking bother people while they're trying to sleep. If there is a next time, that is," Isabella cackles. You want to tell her to stop but she's too far into the moment now; you're likely to end up in a similar fate if you interfere. You can only watch in horror as she lowers the little girl into her mouth feet first, tasting her soft skin and ignoring the fact she's covered in sand. The girl can't seem to scream or cry anymore, she's too shocked at the fact that this is actually happening. You are too.

Isabella's throat begins to easily stretch to accommodate her meal once the girl's slender legs enter it, meanwhile her long tongue continues exploring the girl's body, especially the space under her bathing suit to taste all of her delicate parts. With a few more gulps soon only her head is visible past the teen's plump lips, and with one more she disappears. You can see the outline of her body as it travels down the giantess's throat until she disappears completely behind her collar bone, distending Isabella's belly further.

"Ahhh, guess I woke up for lunch time after all," Isabella says contentedly, dropping her huge man eating ass down in the sand next to you. She leans back on one arm, rubbing her distended and squirming belly with the other. You can see their hands pressing through the fat as they try to escape their flesh prison. "Little brats should've known better. I swear nobody on this beach has any fucking manners." You're not sure how she can be so oblivious to the irony of that statement.

UUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPP

To further your point she lets out a long, rumbling belch, during which time a pair of small pink flip flops, the ones the little girl had been wearing, fly out of her mouth and land in the sand. She doesn't even seem slightly phased by this, she just continues to rub her belly. It almost looks like she's... enjoying feeling the kids struggling.

"So, since I'm clearly not going to be able to relax on this beach," the cannibal giantess says with some annoyance in her voice, "how about we..."
15523112121.title: Don't Wake Isabella

155231121212.content:
"How about we get some more food? Eating really works up my appetite," she pats her belly a few more times. She turns her eyes on you and suddenly to you they're no longer the eyes of a girl, but those of a predator. A jolt of fear causes you to scramble away from her in the sand, but she doesn't chase after you.

"Wait! Aaron, I don't mean you!" She says quickly, her voice softening again. "I promise!"

"You're sure about that?" You ask warily, your eyes moving back and forth between her apologetic face and her still writhing stomach.

"Aaron, if I wanted to eat you I would've done it already. But I don't eat people I like a lot."

"You... like me a lot?"

"Of course I do," she says with a big smile, showing off a surprisingly sweet side to this big bad bully. "Do you know how hard it is to find a cute little skinny boy like you back home? You're perfect! And if you're with me, I'll protect you from any of those hungry sluts that want to snack on you. They know not to fuck with me."

Once again, you find yourself in a position where somehow the safest place to be is right beside a big, bad, man-eating girl. If she's serious about not wanting to eat you and keeping you safe, you just might survive.

"Now come on, let's get some food!" With a grunt of effort and a wet sounding FFFRRRRRSSSSHHHHTTTTT she stands herself up, her engorged tan belly still sloshing and swaying with every movement. You notice a pair of swim trunks come out with the fart, landing in the deep crater her fat ass left in the sand. Again she doesn't notice, nor does she make a move to put her bikini top back on; you doubt anyone will dare tell her she can't be topless. She holds out her huge hand to you and you nervously take it, and she leads you up to the boardwalk. She barges right through more beach set ups like when you arrived, but after what these people have seen they don't even try to stop her. You quietly apologize to them as you go by, and they must think you're her captive or something.

"So, other people in town... eat other people too?" You ask Isabella as you walk together. Other people can't help but stare at the massive girl with her huge, jiggly assets.

"Yeah, it happens," she shrugs. "Sometimes it's an accident, sometimes it's on purpose. Everybody has different tastes. You skinny people just need to stop being so delicious." She giggles, sending chills down your spine.

"And that's just... it's okay to do that?"

"Well... you're not really supposed to talk about it, and it's technically not allowed, but nobody really cares. Everybody knows people do it, skinny people just learn not to fuck with us fat people. Or be around us when we're hungry."

"Okay, but... you're not hungry enough to eat me, right?" You ask again just to be sure.

"Oh no I am starving, I could eat like ten of you right now." Your blood turns to ice as you hear this. "But I'm not gonna, because I like you."

"That doesn't reassure me." You try to pull your hand away from her without her noticing, but you can't escape her grip.

"Okay, here's how I work. Right now you're one of like two skinny people in the whole world I would not eat because you're such a cutie. My dad is only other one who gets a pass because I need him to get me things I want. That and my mom would fucking kill me if I did. Anybody who's not on that list is on the menu. So that includes bratty little kids, bitchy moms, as long as they fit in my mouth they're as good as food."

"But, that's why you need me," she continues. "Other people in town, even the other girls in the class, who knows if they'll give you a pass for being cute like I do? You walk into that school cafeteria, you're on the menu for like ninety percent of the people in there." So everything Michelle had told you was true, these people are cannibals, and they're completely casual about it too! The next chance you get you need to tell your mom to get you out of this crazy town.

Isabella soon stops at an all you can eat restaurant and peers in the window, her huge gut pressing against the glass before her face can. You look in as well and see a horrific scene. Two girls from your class, their greasy bellies bloated to almost twice the size of their massive bodies, are sitting on the floor in the midst of a mess of food and overturned tables and chairs. Some of the furniture even has bites takes out of it. You can see what look like quite a few struggling masses in each of their stomachs, telling you the other diners weren't able to escape.

UUUUUURRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPP
BWWWOOOOAAAAARRRRPPP

Both girls simultaneously let out earth shattering belches that shake the very glass you're leaning against. Bits of food, assorted dinnerware, and even clothes fly from their mouths. The girls just laugh uproariously together.

"Well, guess they cleaned this one out," Isabella says as if seeing a couple girls that have eaten an entire buffet and at least a dozen other diners and servers each is completely normal. "There's gotta be more around here." She pulls you away from the horrific scene and you keep walking.

You almost wonder if you're just caught in a bad dream. There's no way human beings like this exist. Behemoths devouring everything that fits in their mouths, it's just not possible! But everything else in the world still feels real, including your fear of being eaten by one of them.

"Ahah, here's another one. And it looks like nobody's found it yet!" Isabella says excitedly. The first obstacle, however, is the front door. She has to duck to get her head through, but her fat belly and even fatter ass are where the challenge comes in. And unfortunately she went in first. Where have you seen this scenario before?

"Give me a push Aaron!" She yells back to you. All too familiar with how this scene plays out you don't even protest. Your hands sink nearly 6" into her thigh fat before you get to a point where you can start pushing. Normally the smell of the sea and boardwalk food would be in the air, but standing right here you can only smell the rancid, caked on shit in Isabella's asscrack from her morning dump. You push with all your might, ignoring the passersby staring at this bizarre spectacle, while Isabella attempts to pull herself through. As you feel yourself making progress...

CRASSHHHH

Isabella's ass was indeed too big to fit; instead of harmlessly squeezing through, the entire doorway was demolished around her. People waiting to be seated leap out of the way of debris to avoid injury.

"You people really need to make bigger doors," she says annoyedly.

"Uh, m-miss you need to p-pay for that," a nervous stewardess stammers, shocked by the destruction one girl caused.

"Send the bill to my mom, she'll pay for it," Isabella tells her dismissively. "I'm just here for the food." Isabella starts walking toward the dining area, disregarding all the other people who had been waiting for a seat.

"Miss, miss you have wait, there are other people before you!" The stewardess insists. "And you can't come in here without a top on! Miss please--"

FFFFFRRRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAPPPPPPPTTTTTT

Without a word, a horrible eruption of foul gas blasts from the giant Latina's filthy behind. You can see she intentionally grabbed one of her asscheeks to expose her butthole, spraying bits of shit all over the stewardess and the others in the waiting area. The customers run out through the destroyed doorway in disgust while the stewardess tries to hold back her nausea. Beneath the shit she looks almost green in the face.

"Miss, you need to leave," she chokes, refusing to give up through her coughing and gagging. Isabella lets go of your hand and turns around to face the young woman. You're getting more and more familiar vibes about this scene too.

"Bitch, do you realize how fucking tiny you are?" Isabella asks sharply, sticking her huge stomach in the woman's face to emphasize her girth. "And you think you can tell I have to wait for my food? You have it all sitting out right there." She points to the dining area.

"There were *ack* other people waiting," the woman replies, still coughing.

"I don't give a shit about the other people. I'm hungry. You're not the first twig I've run into today that thought she could tell me what to do, the other one was just lucky I wasn't too hungry. You, though..."

Isabella reaches down and grabs the poor woman by the collar of her shirt, hoisting her into the air to look at her face to face. She struggles to free herself but there's no escaping Isabella's iron grip. "You'll barely be an appetizer." The Latina smiles her huge yellow smile before stuffing the woman into her mouth, wrapping her lips around her neck. Her body flails around in Isabella's grasp, her screams muffled by the plump cheeks she's surrounded by. The hungry giantess doesn't stop to play with her food though; in one gulp the woman's entire torso disappears, leaving only her helplessly kicking legs; in another, she disappears into Isabella's abyssal belly.

BBBRRRRAAAAAAPPPPP

"I sure hope more people try to annoy me today, gives me a good excuse to have a meal," Isabella laughs as she rubs her stomach, enjoying the mad flailing of the helpless woman inside.

As the two of you enter the dining room Isabella certainly draws some eyes with her huge, half naked body, but it was probably because of that body that nobody saw her voracious act just now. Parents cover their children's eyes from looking upon her nudity as she gazes out across the room, drool spilling from the corners of her lips, though given her appetite you're not sure if she's more interested in the buffet or the other customers. As she makes her first move her goal becomes clear, she's hungry for...
155231121212.title: A Girl's Gotta Eat

choices: Stay and find a booth for Isabella
1552311212121.content:
You should feel relieved seeing Isabella craving actual food instead of people, but you only feel is a drowning flood of embarrassment as she tears apart the buffet. Ignoring the stacks of plates waiting to carry her food, she shoves her fat hand into a tray of deep-fried chicken fingers and drops a large handful into her wide drooling mouth. Resiny ropes of drool battered with bread and meat bit escape her lips as she chews the enormous glob of food with her mouth wide open. Meanwhile, you try you're best to hide your face from the burning stares of everyone in the restaurant.

"Jesus CHRIST! Why are these nuggets so FUCKING GOOD?!" Says Isabella; either oblivious or apathetic of how badly she was upsetting the restaurant. Either way, she lifts the entire tray of chicken off the buffet table and hands it over to you.

"Here: find us a booth, drop these off and come back. I'm going have a bunch more stuff for you to take for me." She says as you almost fall over from the weight of the metal tray in your arms. "Awww! They have burritos too! Gimmie!"

Between the horrors of cannibalism, flatulence and crippling embarrassment, you don't know how much more you could take from Isabella. Even if she says she'll keep you safe, she's not doing your sanity any favors; nor your nose. You decide it's well worth the risk to try and escape. Besides, even if she catches you, she won't do anything to hurt you. While Isabella distracts herself with an arm full of burritos, you spot a clear path through the tabes to the back of the restaurant. You just have to slink away and leave through the back door. If she spots you fleeing; you figure you can fool her by saying you're going to the bathroom. As you drop the tray of chicken fingers on the floor, You have no idea what you'll do once you're outside or where you'll go. That doesn't really matter to you right now anyway. What's really important is getting away from...

"Hey babe," Isabella says between mouthfuls of Tex-Mex. "I just remembered something I wanted to ask you a while ago."

"uh...yeah? What?" You ask, keeping an eye on the trail of freedom.

You feel a subtle shiver work its way through your body as you watch Isabella turn her head to face you with a serious look. The glare she beamed into your eyes tore your focus from escape to the words leaving her mouth: "Back at the beach; what did you mean when you told that kid that I wasn't your girlfriend?"

Your heart starts rattling in your chest like a spray can. The route to freedom disappeared under a cloud of excuses and thought of how you could’ve been so stupid to say something so damning near her. Realizing you've been silent for two whole seconds, you blurt out a jumble of words to alieve suspicion.

"The...um, you were sleeping...hearing things while I...had... sand in my mouth, so it...just...sounded like I said that?"

Isabella's humorless gaze hangs over you for a moment before a bright smile replaces it. "Yeah, that's what I thought," she says.

A sigh of relief only partially escapes you as Isabella walks over and squats to meet you face to face. You fight to unwrinkle your nose as her mouth blasts you with her hot rancid breath.

"I'm really glad that's the case, Aaron," Says Isabella. "'cause if I found out you weren't serious about being my boyfriend, I probably wouldn't like you very much...and you know what happens to people I douuuUUUUUURRRRP"

A deep sour belch rips through Isabella's throat an in your face; pelting you with morsels of food and sticky spittle. Looking very annoyed, she rises to her feet and looks down on her distended stomach. Wrestling with her fat folds inside her belly, you can make out the outline of the Hostess's hands and face fighting a losing battle escape her prison of glut.

"Sit the fuck back down, dammit! You're giving me a UUUUUURPtummy ache!" Isabella yells at her stomach. With a firm slap, the form slowly shrinks back into her corpulent belly. With her stomach settled, her attention returns to you cowering form; mortified by the horrible visage you saw inside her.

"Aw, don't be scared, baby. I already said I wasn't gonna hurt you. So long as we're together." She says with unnerving sweetness. "Here; I know what'll calm you down."

Before you know what's happening; Isabella's arms wrap around your waist, and you find yourself flying into her fat make-up slathered face. You think for a second that she's trying to eat you until you crash into the cushion of her lips. Without warning, her enormous tongue juts into your mouth like a shoehorn; almost shoving your own down your throat. It's all you can do not to choke as Isabella slurps the entire inside of your mouth; moaning loudly as her tastebuds brush your inner cheek. As warm bitter saliva pours into your mouth, you feel the gazes burning into you again. Tens of eyes staring at you while an obese whale rapes your mouth. You hear camera phones go off, but not one voice coming to your aid.

A long string of spit stretches unbroken from your mouth to Isabella's as she breaks her three-minute make-out session.

"Feel better, babe?"

There’s so much gluey spit in your mouth; all you can do is gurgle incoherently and wearily.

“Awesome,” Isabella says, clapping her hands together. Then she lifts the hefty plate of burritos and drops it into your hands; doubling you over again as you try carrying it. “Take those with the nuggets and bring them to a booth for both of us. Oh; and get the waiter to get us ten more trays each…and a 7-Up. I need something to settle my stomach.”

Almost on cue, Isabella’s rear spewed another sour note. The blast was so forceful, a man who was unfortunate enough to try and squeeze past her giant ass was blasted off his feet, over a counter and into an unsuspecting chef cutting slices off a large side of ham. The chef’s face hit his cutting board and launched entire portion of meat through the air, into Isabella’s waiting arms.

“See you at the table, babe,” Isabella says before she takes the ham side by the bone and bites into it. You wince as her teeth effortlessly crunch the bone hidden inside. “I’m gonna take this over to the chocolate fountain. I’ll try to save you a piece.”

As Isabella leaves you head over to help the man and the chef back on their feet; apologizing over and over as you do so.

“Young man, I won’t say anything about your taste in women,” The chef says as he uprights himself. “But if I were you, I’d find myself, someone, more…” He stops to spot a frustrated Isabella trying to force the – comparatively – small chocolate fountain to fit every inch of her ham before a crowd of bewildered customers. She only manages to cover a corner in fudge before she ends up snapping the whole thing in two.

“-restrained,” The Chef continues.

“She’s not-“

You bite your tongue before the last word. Fortunately, Isabella was far too busy cussing out the broken chocolate fountain to hear you. In fact, if you were to leave the restaurant right now, she probably wouldn’t notice. Of course, if she catches you, you’d be in trouble.
1552311212121.title: Order to Go

15523112121212.content:
"...and then he has the balls to tell me I'm 'causing a scene'. And I'm like, listenShithead; if I'm 'causing a scene', it's because your cheap ass didn't shell out for a decent fucking chocolate fountain! I'm the customer! You're the restaurant manager! Show some goddamn responsibility! Then he’s lookin’ at me all bug-eyed; like he didn't understand the simple fucking words coming out of my mouth!"

You just kept nodding in hollow support of Isabella's inane ramblings as your hands propped your weary head on a cramped spot between stacks of food trays crowding the booth's table. You had to sit on her massive knee while her entire butt occupied the entirety of your booth and some of the aisle. After an hour of berating the manager, the poor man relented. He gave Isabella a much larger sturdier chocolate fountain – something the restaurant had reserved in their backroom for events – and an overstocked buffet of food delivered right to your table...on the condition that she put her clothes back on. Isabella accepted the terms, but she was quick you let you and the entire restaurant know her frustration in explicit detail.

"...and why the fuck does that skinny puta over there get to wear her ugly little bikini here and I don't?" Isabella carried on, showering her food pile with bits of chocolate-covered hamburger. "That's motherfucking discrimination! That jackass manager is discriminating against me. And I bet you I know why! You wanna know why?"

"Why?" You sighed. You were only half listening to her. The other half of your mind was preoccupied thinking about how far away you'd be from Isabella if you'd only taken the chance to escape. You could have still managed to slip away from her; but her knee was so fat, it squished your legs against the underside of the table. Like it or not; you were stuck listening to her and her stomach as it attempted to digest the sudden avalanche. Despite your many misgiving with Isabella, you still felt a twinge of guilt in hoping the pans of mac and cheese she was shoveling out of the fountain either caught in her throat or gave her a heart attack.

Only a twinge though.

"Because skinny people are fucking jealous of Hershey," Isabella said as she ate an entire pan of mac and cheese out of the fountain. "You're cool, but every other skinny person has this fucking retarded problem where they get all insecure around full-bodied people like me. Like they're all threatened because we have the discipline to put enough food in ourselves to make us sexy. And then they wonder why everybody in Hearshy treats them like garbage. It's literally fucking pathetic. Oh! And then they're all like, 'Oh! Obesity causes health problems'. Horseshit! The only health problems I'm gonna get is from listening to..."

Somewhere in the restaurant, you heard someone laughing almost as loud as Isabella is ranting. Instantly, Isabella's knee almost crushed your legs underneath the table as she turned around in her seat. She ignored your cry of pain as she scanned the entire restaurant.

"I fucking heard that!" She exploded across the entire restaurant. "Which one of you cowardly little shits laughed at me? Get over here so I can kick your scrawny ass!"

The entire restaurant fell silent. Nobody said a word. Everyone, even the children, kept their heads down.

"Yeah, that's what I fucking thought...pendejos," Isabella said as she returns to her seat; releasing much-needed circulation to your cold aching legs. "...fuck it! I'm taking my top back off."

"No, please don't;" You said with a worn tone; just as she got her shirt half-way off her bloated gut. "I really don't want them to kick us out."

"I'd like to see them fucking try."

"Please? For me?"

Isabella looked at you for a moment before she pulled her shirt back down. "Fine," she said as she rolled up an entire pizza and shoved it into the fountain. "As long as they keep my plate full. Otherwise, I'm going to have my mom sue this place into the ground for discrimination."

"Thank you," You exhaled in relief. You heard the rest of the restaurant quietly share your sentiment as you took a drink of water. "How about we change the subject to something a little more pleasant."

"Okay," Isabella agreed through a mouthful of chocolate-pepperoni pizza. "After this, you wanna fuck me at school or my house?"

A spit-take sent your glass of water spilling into the aisle floor. You never had sex before, but there was no way in hell you were going to share your first experience with someone so physically and morally disgusting as Isabella. "er...I was thinking more like...your family. What are they all about, huh?"

You really didn't care. You just needed something to get her mind off crushing your bones in a fit of passion.

"My family?" Isabella said as she took another pizza slice. This time, wrapping it around mashed potatoes like a burrito. "Well, I've got a little brother. He's fine when he's not being a shit stain. Then my mother...my Mom is literally the most amazing woman who's ever lived."

"Really now?" you say with a hint of sarcasm. You imagined a larger, older, almost blob-like Isabella planted on a bed with an oxygen tank clipped to her nose. She stuffed her zit-coated face with an industrial drum of bonbons as she watched a marathon of Murray Povitch on TV. The mental image was as humorous as it was terrifying.

"Yeah," Isabella's expression brightens as she continued. "She's smart, she's beautiful, she's strong, she's the CEO of a major pharmaceutical company..."

"Wait, what?" Your mental image of Isabella's mother warped into a well-dressed woman with sharp piercing eyes. She's still fat, but not enough to take away from the contagious air of confidence the permeates around her. Not at all like you were expecting.

"Yeah, she started the company all by herself too. She's really amazing," Said Isabella. "I wanna be like her when I get older."

"What about your dad? Is he cool too?"

You saw Isabella's smile begin to twitch at your question. A loud snort served as the prelude to a boisterous fit of laughter that dropped bits of half-eaten chocolate food everywhere. Even underneath her shirt, you saw her stomach jiggle out of control while liquid poured out her eyes and mouth.

"Oh...oh god," Isabella gasped as her laughter died down into small little chuckles. "My stomach fucking hurts so bad...oh god. What were we talking about again?"

"...your dad. What's he like?"

A storm of spit washed across your face before Isabella started laughing again. This time, loud enough to return every eye in the restaurant back to her.

"Oh god...I was just kidding. I remember. I just wanted to hear you say it again." She said as the second laughing fit comes to a close. "You wanna know about my dad? He's a fucking loser. That's what he is."
15523112121212.title: Booth Babes (part 1 of 3)

155231121212121.content:
Okay; that wasn’t the response you were expecting out of that question. “Well…I mean everyone thinks their dad is a loser. You think maybe you’re being a little-“

“Aaron, he’s 100% pure grade loser.” Isabella interrupted. “I know, my aunts know, my Abuela knows, my brother’s starting clue in. Only person who doesn’t seem to think so is Mom, and even she’s getting worn out with his bullshit.”

“So what exactly-“

“He’s the school’s gym teacher; literally the shittiest job on the planet. Like, what kind of asshole makes a career out of making people lose weight? It’s like he doesn’t even care how embarrassing it is to have everyone give me looks in the hallway because my skinny dad’s trying to make them skinny. Like, what kind of backward-ass retard-“
