You reach for the door, only to stop your hand once your fingertips touch the cold metal handle. You’re suddenly having second thoughts about this class. You love gym classes, but you’re not looking forward to a gym full of the guys you saw walking through the halls. Your stomach turns just imagining what the locker room is going to smell like. And with you likely being the smallest guy in class, there was a good chance you were going to get a taste of what happened back in the hallway. That, and with you being thirty minutes late, there was no telling what the teacher was going to do. Were the teachers as bad as the students here? Probably, considering none of them did anything when you and that girl were getting hassled.

Maybe you should just ditch class. Hell, just ditch school. This place isn’t worth the hassle. Besides, with everyone and everything so big here, the teachers probably would notice a small student going missing anyway.
15523122.title: Meet Chelsea

155231222.content:
The longer you stay at this crazy school, the sooner you’ll end up crushed or farted on. Best to just leave while nobody’s looking. You’re not sure what you’ll do once your outside school grounds, but you’d cross that bridge when you got there. For now, you had to figure out how to get out of here.

Outside, in front of the gymnasium; you could see across the blacktop to the school’s parking lot. Luckily for you, the chain link fence separating the rest of the school from the lot was left wide open. There was nothing stopping you from just walking through and ducking out the parking lot. Of course, there might be a teacher or two wandering nearby. Though from what you’ve seen, they were in no shape to catch you if you just jogged out of their reach. They’d exhaust themselves before getting anywhere near you.

You turn to leave the gymnasium, then almost fall over backward when you find an imposing pair of thick muscular legs standing behind you. You gaze labors a long climb up nearly ten feet of a light-golden brown burly woman. Thick beads of sweat soaked her tight tank top, gym shorts, and her short-wedged brown hair. But what really made her stand out, besides her height, was that she was the only person sporting visible muscle that you’d seen since coming here. There was still a considerable layer of fat coating it, but it was still visible underneath her girth. That and her smell…god; it was like a men’s locker room with a backed-up urinal.

“Pretty late for Gym class, aren’t you, little boy?” She says in a low husky voice. The look in her eyes unnerved you hard enough to make you forget about peeking at her generous bust. There was something about how her piercing green eyes locked with yours. It almost felt like the giant already knew what you were planning to do.

“Uh, no. I j-just got a little lost trying to fi-find m-my classroom,” You had no idea how hard you were shaking until you heard yourself speak. You try to keep it together, but the imposing figure the middle-aged amazon woman cuts before you keep your heart beating like crazy. “I-I’m trying to find…uh, the science lab. Yeah, the science lab.”

The giant’s eyes narrowed to a glare. “You’re Aaron Jacob, right? You’re supposed to be in Gym class right now. Science is tomorrow.”

You restrain a startled squeak as your heart almost flies out your throat. She knows your name and your schedule? Shit! What are you going to do now? Your hands dig into your pants pockets while you cobble together an excuse.

“That’s…actually not my name. I’m actually…” You quickly scour your brain for a convincing fake name. “Jacob Aaron.”

‘Oh, brilliant’, you think to yourself. ‘No way she’ll crack that clever little DaVinci code.”

“Uh, Aaron’s actually my…cousin. Yeah! Cousin! We just happen to look alike. Everybody always mixes us up. It’s a common mistake,” You explain as you continue to sell this shitty shitty lie.
The giant woman smiles down at you, but it does nothing to improve your confidence. It’s not a warm expression either. In fact, it’s making your skin crawl and your ribs shiver.

“Well in that case, why don’t we take you to the principal’s office, ‘Jacob’?” Says the giantess. “I’m sure she can help us figure out where you need to go.”

This time, you can’t save yourself from yelping. The memory of being crushed under the principal’s massive ass sends panic coursing through your body. No way were you going to meet that horrifying woman again.

“N-No, that’s fine. I think I can find my own way to class,” You say as you start walking away from the giant teacher and towards the parking lot. She can’t hurt you if you’re nowhere near her. At least that’s what you tell yourself.

“Hey, the science classrooms are over there!” The teacher says, pointing behind her to the main school building. “Get back here! I’m taking your ass to the Principal!”

Uh oh! She’s swearing. Not a good sign.

“No, no, it’s fine. I’m…just…uh,”

Fuck it.

Like a whip, you snap yourself around and bolt across the blacktop. You hear the teacher screaming after you, but you couldn’t care less about what she has to say. There are a few students and teachers around watching you, but you're moving too fast for their pudgy bodies to react. As your legs propel you across the asphalt like a fish through water, you wonder why you didn’t just run away the first place. You might have been a terrible liar, but you were the star sprinter back at your old school. As fast as you were moving, there was no way anyone could catch you.

Halfway to the gate, you decide to look over your shoulder at that massive teacher; hoping to glimpse her pathetically trying to waddle after you on her fat awkward-

JESUS CHRIST SHE’S RIGHT BEHIND YOU!

How did you not notice her? She’s a foot away from grabbing the back of your shirt. You could practically see steam blowing out of her ears while her bright red face twisted into an ugly scowl. Monstrous grunts sound through her bared gritted teeth as she claws at the air behind your neck. Her massive gut and bust jiggle madly with each thunderous step she takes after you. It would’ve been hilarious if it weren't so horrifying. Fear-laced adrenaline pours through your body to give you a desperate boost of speed, but it does practically nothing to slow her gain on you. How the hell can someone that fat move faster than you?

“YOU BETTER KEEP RUNNING, YOU LITTLE BITCH!” You can feel her bellowing voice rattling your bones with every syllable. “’CAUSE IF I CATCH YOU, I'LL WREAK YOUR CANDY ASS SO BAD, I COULD USE YOU LIKE A BOWLING ALLEY!”

Your throat is cold and dried, your knees are aching, stinging sweat is getting into your eyes, and you’re pretty sure your heart just hammered through one of your ribs. You burned through all your reserved stamina, and it still didn’t help you escape. It’s only a matter of time before she catches you to do lord knows what.

Just then, you hear the ring of the school bell. Immediately after, the doors of the school building swing open, and a crowd of fat students starts pouring out of the halls and onto the blacktop. It must be nutrition.

Since there’s no way you can outrun this mad teacher and make it to the parking lot, you’ll have to lose her somehow. Maybe if you run through the crowd of students; she’ll lose sight of you. Of course, that means getting uncomfortably close to a mass of your sweaty, stinky, unhygienic peers. Would getting slathered in fat really be worth it? On the other hand, you could run through the halls to find an empty classroom to hide in. That sounds better, but could you find a hiding place faster than this monster could move?
155231222.title: Run

choices: "...make you enroll in the girl's gym class."
1552312221.content:
Your lungs are burning, your head is pounding, and beneath your wobbling legs, the shadow of the monstrous teacher stretches far ahead of you like a foreboding specter. You hear her bulky hands swipe at the back of your neck like a lancinating pendulum coming nearer and nearer. You've already burned through you reserve strength to get this far, and it still isn't enough. She'll catch you eventually unless you do something...desperate.

You have just enough stamina to head into the lumbering crowd of portly students. At your size, it should be easy for you to hide, but that means throwing yourself into a mob of walking filth. It's hard to recognize the irony with so little oxygen moving through your brain. All you know is that there's no guarantee you'd find a classroom to hide in before the teacher tore you in half. You'd take a deep breath before rushing in, but your overloaded lungs wouldn't allow it. All you can do is bid farewell to fresh air

You almost stumble over your weary legs as you take a sharp turn and wedge yourself between the crowd. Easier said than done considering how thick everyone's legs are. You don't want to think about what kind of excrement is making their legs so wet and oily, but it squeezes you through like a pea pushed through a pod. With your head so far below the height of the mob, light is limited. You immediately regret your plan as noxious fumes waft inside your nose. Smells of rotting eggs, open sores, and feces invaded your body and soured it from inside-out. Uncontrollable coughing fits rattle your body like a rag doll, wringing your empty lungs for air that didn't exist. Your throat felt like it was being crushed in a vice. Wet shadowy bulges of skin and cloth smeared across your arms and face. The few students who noticed you in the sea of fat warned you to get out of the way.

In the span of two and a half seconds, you were on the ground where wet sharts and sour feet drug out your torment. Sickness and exhaustion replaced the last bit of resilience in your body. You tried to keep your cover by crawling with the crowd but you hadn't a firm enough grip on your consciousness to keep it up. Soon, the cover of the crowd moves on to the lunchroom without you. Warm sunlight washes over your weary form before a familiar shadow blot it out.

"Nice try, bitch," You hear the teacher say as you feel her huge hand wrap around your ankle.

There's nothing left inside of you to resist as she lifts your body into the air and slings you over her shoulder like a wet towel with your head hanging over her back. Your lame body bobs and sways with her movements as she starts walking away with you. Some stragglers from the crowd stop to point and laugh at you, but you don't have the energy to care.

"Bet you thought you were hot shit tryin' to sneak off without anybody noticing didn't you?" The teacher laughs. "Thought I was too big and slow to catch your scrawny ass before you squeezed through that gate, right?"

You couldn't respond even if you wanted to. You're too focused on breathing clean air to replenish your body. A task made difficult by the odor oozing out teacher's pores and hairy underarms. Plus your poor throat is haggard from all the coughing you did. It's in no shape to make any sort of sound above a subtle wheeze. At least that's what you thought before a brutally hard smack on your rear tears a loud yelp out your mouth.

"You better speak to me when I ask you a question; hear?"

"yes..." You respond faintly. That yelp felt like it shredded you throat into confetti. Not to mention your butt stings as if you just sat on a hot iron.

"I can't fucking HEAR YOU!"

"Yes," Your throat feels like it ripped your neck open just to give an audible answer.

"That's better,' Says the Teacher as she enters a building. More students laugh at you as you're carried helplessly through the school halls. "Don't worry. I'll have plenty of time to teach you how to talk to me once I get through with that ass."

Pain burns your nervous system as the Teacher's fat fingers pinch your agonizing butt. "Mmm..but it's probably going to be a good long while before that happens. You made me work extra hard to chase down this tasty little ass. I might as well take my sweet time enjoying it."

Your brain is functional enough to process the dread and fear overwhelming you. Though your still too weak to run away. You probably wouldn't get too far anyway. You were fast, but this woman was borderline superhuman. She'd probably break your legs before you made it off her shoulder. More than enough reason to be afraid of what she's planning to do to you.

"Name's Casey by the way." The Teacher says. "Make sure you scream it while I'm redecorating your prostate."

Your limp body finally stills. Casey stopped moving, but you can't see where she's carried you.

"'course that's going to have to wait until I..."
1552312221.title: Scent of irony

155232.content:
Unfortunately, your aunt decided it be a good career opportunity to take up your principals assistant offer, not bothering to ask you and what the job actually entailed besides working for her! To say you were thrilled with the prospect would be the understatement of the year, infuriated and dreading it would some it up nicely though. To make matters worse, the only thing Beatrice told you was you’d have to wake up at 5:00 am every day to get ready for your new job! Something you groggily forced yourself through this very morning as you used your aunt’s rarely used shower to wash yourself of the stink you’ve endured, dressed yourself and prepared your backpack for the day, not even trying to look for food that wasn’t pizza to eat in the kitchen and planned to just wait for lunch to eat. Just as you zipped your bag, you heard a few strong knocks at the door.

With a yawn and deep jump, you grabbed onto the doorknob and jerked your body to open it, to your shock, it was both your principal and new employer! Her incredibly tall form reaching the peak of the door frame, her ruby lipstick smiling face looking down at you with a almost ecstatic grin. Her poorly fitted outfit was about the same as what you saw on her the other day, save for her suit now being a admittedly stylish shade of maroon instead of gray, with a skirt to match instead of the black one you were up close and personal with before.

“Hello and good morning Aaron! I hope you slept well!” She smiled, bringing up her wrist to her face to look her watch as you were about to answer.

“*Yawn* um as good as I could...Ma’am, um why are you here exactly?” You stammered, genuinely wondering why your principal had come to your aunt’s apartment.

“Well the school buses don’t run at this hour and I couldn’t have you aunt drive you to school at such an early hour! So from now on I’m gonna be driving you too and from school!” She cheered, flashing you a glossy smile as she bent over and grabbed onto your arm and began to drag you off the ground as she began to walk out the door with you. With any possible resistance you tired to offer being nothing to this giant of a woman, easily picking you up like a child.

“Come on now Aaron! We’ve got a busy day and I hate being late!” She commanded, leading you to the elevator and quickly clicking the button, tapping her swollen foot impatiently for its arrival. Which was thankfully quick as not exactly a lot of people were using the elevator at this hour. With its arrival, she placed you down on the floor of the elevator first and then walked in herself, the top of her bun barely scraping the ceiling and her wide frame eclipsing anything from view for you to see behind her, your eyes being unfortunately drawn to the familiar seat of her skirt as she bent over to click the button to go to ground floor, the sight of her suffocating asscheeks and terrifying lack of underwear gave you a cold sweat.

After seeing that, you decided to put your justified unease of your principal aside to actually make some headway to understand what your new job actually would have you do.

“Umm Principal” was all you managed to get out before you heard Sizemore let out a giggle.

“Oh you please, Ms. Sizemore or Caroline will be fine, your much more than just a student now...” she insisted with a unsettlingly suggestive inflection that made your skin crawl.

“Okay, Ms. Sizemore, can you tell me exactly what I’ll be doing as your assistant?” You asked sheepishly, very not sure how to deal with this woman yet.

“Well your position...” was all she began, only to be cut off by the ding of the elevator door opening and the arrival to the ground floor.

“Oh we’re here! Well talk about it in the care, a great topic to get my mind off the ride!” Your principal decided, walking out with you trying to keep pace with her far wider paces. This eventually lead to the parking lot outside the building where she unlocked her silver, tank sized minivan and ushered you in, unlocking the trunk to retrieve something as you hesitantly opened the passenger door.

You were immediately assaulted by a horrid, methane rich atmosphere as you struggled to get yourself up into the passenger seat, this horrid odor far too familiar to you as the smell of your principals gas that stained your memory after only one nostril assault the other day. Your eyes watered as they looked into the back where you a massive heap of old, stained laundry covered half the cars interior, with the other side bent loose papers, discarded boxes of donuts and empty ice tea cups. Swallowing the bile in your throat, you forced yourself up and sat in the oversized seat, listening to Caroline rummage in the back as you nervously took in your surroundings and trying not to vomit. Just like your aunts car, it was definitely oversized, but had a few interesting differences, the driver's seat was exceedingly bigger than yours, most likely custom to accommodate your principals massive size.

Along with that, you saw something odd in the center of the wide car seat, dead center of the ass groove engrained in the leather was a small, half open ziplock bag, which contained a single, blueberry muffin. Which, as you tried to lean in closer to see, had “Aaron’s breakfast, don’t forget!!!” Written across the plastic in it in big, deep red marker. You couldn’t help but be a little touched at the gesture of her getting you breakfast!

“I hope you like my car Aaron! Your gonna be seeing it a lot the rest of this school year.” You heard Caroline finally say as she opened her car door, an entire box of donuts in her other hand as she lurched up to sit down in her seat, clearly forgetting about the muffin as her gigantic globes swallowed it between her cheeks as she sat down with a wobbling thump. A act you can’t help but feel is a bit too foreboding about how your experience with her may shape up to be like.

With a satisfied sigh, Caroline pulled her keys from her suit pocket and started the car, placing her donut box on her lap and slipped several out and put the roasted breakfast holes between her fingers in her off hand, while using the other to start driving after buckling herself in. “Now to describe your job” she started, slipping several bits of the donuts in her mouth. Her friendly expression somewhat serious, professional one as she took a breath and few chews before beginning.

“The position as my assistant is a vigilant, but not demanding job. My secretary already handles most of my meetings and other nitty gritty stuff. Your job will be more of a personal ‘helper’ than anything. Getting files out for me, reaching and handling spots I can’t on my own, doing little things here and there, accompanying me wherever I go for most of the day and any other odds and ends that may pop up...” Principal Sizemore explained between her the noise of chewing and smacking her lips.

So far, beyond the fact you’d have to have to spend most of your time with Sizemore, a part of you was honestly glad it didn’t sound particularly difficult of a job in comparison to jobs your friends have had back at home. This train of thought was interrupted however as a deep grumble roared in your employers massive gut, something she didn’t seem hardly issued with as she kept her eyes on the road and continued her explanation.

“You’ll be working for me pretty much for the rest of the school year, with all superfluous classes like gym and any fluff courses you’d be enrolled in cut for you to spend helping me. The remaining 3 classes of your day being your core math, science and English classes. Your Lunch period is still intact but I am allowed to call you to keep BBBBUUUURRRPP me company if I do choose! In terms of hours you’ll be with BBBBRRRPPPPPFFFTTT me for 5 hours in the first part of the day every day of the school week, and 2 hours a day after school every other day.” She explained, your attention to which was severely undercut by the several harsh bouts of gas she did as she spoke, the noxious odor of her vehicle that you just barely had been able to tolerate while stale renewed to your noses horror and your eyes watering.

“In terms of benefits and perks you’ll find it to be quiet nice! Besides the whole missing 3 classes PPHHHRRTTT bit, your awarded several points of extra credit each month to a class of your choice to help keep pace with your peers in terms of GPA. Your lunch bill will also be completely BBBRRRHHHTT handled, not a single ounce of your aunt’s money needed. You’ll also be given complete access to all normally restricted areas to students, such as the faculty bathroom and lounge when your accompanying me. Lastly, this job will definitely look great on a resume and college application!” She finished, the continued gaseous assault on your senses as she explained and undercut as you coughed your heart away.

“That’s it! Now we’re almost there and...” was all she managed to saw before, like a geyser, let out a deep, blow horn roaring fart that completely cut off what she was saying...

PPPRRAAASSSHHHTTT

To say it was bad would be an understatement, it was plan hellish!! Your eyes completely broke out red and your lungs roared for air as a almost visible fog shot from her rear end, and, subsequently, your muffin, completely smashed and bag half full of her sweat, flew out of her asscrack and landed square in your lap.

“Oh I completely forgot! I got this muffin for you! Oh it looks like I might have mashed it a bit, but that isn’t a problem right?” She asked, returning to focusing on driving as she got to her reserved parking spot and parked.

“We’re here! You can eat that inside, right now I need you too...”

Hurry up! We’re almost five minutes late and there’s much to be done!

Reach back and grab the other donut box I got! I think I put it where all my laundry is now...
155232.title: Start your first day as Sizemore's assistant.

1553.content:
Ana Kent - 18 years old, 6'0'': Straight blonde hair and green eyes. You're tall compared to most girls your age, a result of a sudden growth spurt at puberty that's said to occur in the females in your family. Combined with your impressive musculature, the daily work on the family apple farm is less taxing then it otherwise normally would be, your already lightly tanned Portuguese skin bronzed by the sizzling sun shining upon you. However, one day, you were visited by a distant relative who requested that your physical prowess and produce expertise could of use in pushing a new line of Hershey Chocolate-Caramel Apple Pies. It was an odd choice to come all the way out into the country for an occupation that surely someone else would be more qualified for, but you chalk that up to possible nepotism. At any rate, you think that some time in the big city would be a nice change of pace from the mundane monotony of rural living and so with a hearty handshake that leaves your relative's hand throbbing a bit, you set off to a place of new experiences... with unforeseen consequences.

Zarya Masters - 24 years old, 5'5": Bald and red eyes. You've lived a life of relative success, acting as a well-respected food critic whose nuanced, yet fair reviews have resulted in an increase in quality of the delicacies served at the various eateries stationed around your hometown. A side effect of your constant consumption is a pretty patch of pudge protruding from your paunch, though it doesn't garner many gazes, and the select few have been positive, along with those aimed at the ivory skin pigments attributed to a lack of outdoor activity outside of work. When you caught wind of the city of Hershey and it's fame chocolate-centric dishes, you sense a golden opportunity to expand your brand across the land, although it's also possible that your figure might face a few flavorful foes along the way.
1553.title: Even More Newcomers?

15533.content:
Daniel Baker - 23 years old, 5’10”. Curly brown hair and dark brown eyes. Your a small town guy fresh out of college and, after spending a year back at home, you want to get out on your own. The issue is, finding someplace to set yourself up and start your own life is tough, so much to consider and little money to get yourself started made it all quiet bone chilling for you. That’s when you found yourself talking to a old friend of yours, Haley Law.
The two of you and her younger sister, Roxanne, were thick as thieves for most of your childhood. Having kept close for most of your middle and high school lives, but when college came, you sorta lost touch with them for awhile. Before you knew it they graduated and moved to a place a few towns over called Hershey. Haley, always the generous type, offered you just what you were looking for, a place to stay at the apartment Roxanne and her share and a helping hand at finding a job! With her saying, “It’s about time the old gang gets back together!”
With little options and a genuine desire to get back together with your old friends, you took what little money you had to get a bus ticket, got your stuff together, said goodbye to your family and friends, and headed off to your new life in Hershey with Haley and Roxanne....
15533.title: Another Outsider

155331.content:
“Last stop. Hershey. Time is 1:20 PM...” Rang the automated, yet feminine voice of the bus as it reached your stop. With your heart swelling from excitement, you grabbed your duffel bag and flung your backpack around your shoulder, your rounded face smiling with excitement with your arrival. You’ve finally made it! The start of your independent life in a new town with your old friends being the ones who are giving it all to you!

As you slowly trudged down the narrow bus row, you couldn’t help but grin at the thought of seeing your friends again! Your old neighborhood was very low in terms of kids when you were growing up, with Haley and Roxanne being the only two close enough to your age to really play with as a kid, despite being 5 and 4 years older than you respectively. All the same, you had fond memories of the three of you hanging out, playing pretend, biking around the neighborhood, all sorts of childhood wonders you’ve honestly forgotten until today as nostalgia flooded your mind as you walked out the bus.

“Daniel!!! Hey Daniel!! We’re over here man!! Here!! Over here!!” Bellowed a familiar voice that rang out as soon as you stepped out. You tried to find the source of the outcry, but the wash of people in front of you made your search all difficult.
“Just follow my voice man! We’re over here in the back!” Screamed the same voice even louder than before to help you locate who you already pegged as Haley.
Now with a new vocalized frame of reference, you quickly worked your way through the still present crowd of people, with the occasional “sorry” as you bumped and ducked your way closer and closer to your old friends!
Then, after getting past a final couple, you got to where you heard your old friends voice, and stood their, mouth agape, at what you saw...the two of them, were Huge!

At first, you honestly had a hard time wrapping your head around that these were your friends at all! Your mental images of the teenage girls you last saw them as shattered as your eyes sank in the site of your friends new massive forms forms. The two of them were easily over 8’ feet tall, with maybe a hardly noticeable inch or two difference between them, both of them, however, being wider than you were tall in their own unique ways.

The older of the two, Haley, had a unique figure, with her bulk being distributed in a extreme hourglass manner, starting from her copious, sweat glazed breasts that were half exposed from her hot pink tank top, the flimsy fabric half coated in dark streaks of sweat. Going down, her plump abdomen and beer belly were fully exposed due to how poorly fitting the top she wore was, with her expansive hips and vice like thighs hardly contained in a pair of bright, rainbow technicolor shorts that barely did much to cover her oak-like legs that reached to her tennis shoe covered feet. Funnily enough, the only thing that didn’t seem to change was her face, reaching from her strong neck was the same grinning girl you remembered. A pair of gleaming blue eyes, a sharp nose, a long streak of dirty blonde hair tied back in a ponytail that reaches past her large shoulders, with a pair of honestly well kept, glowing white teeth.

The younger of the two, Roxanne, was definitely the most changed of the two. The last time you saw Roxanne, she was barely 100 pounds and thin as a rail, but now, it looked like she was at least 6 times that now! Her once slight, thin face was now completely stuffed plump! Chubby cheeks, several chins, all wrapped in pale white skin complemented by her pale blue eyes, button nose and messy auburn hair tied back in a short, sloppily made bun. Unlike her sister, Roxane’s weight was a lot less generous in how it was placed. With her strained, dark navy blue sweater struggling to cover her (relatively) modest breasts and massive gut, the tale end of which hung out of her sweater to reveal her cavernous belly button and the forest of light brown hairs jutting around it. Even with her gut being so big, it paled in comparison to her lower body, with her hips being a swollen mass that far outstretched her sisters in size, collecting downward to thighs and legs so thick they looked like they weighed as much as three of you alone! All reaching to a pair of poorly fitting, dark brown Ugg boots.
“Ohhh. MY. GODDDD!!” Screeched Haley at the top of her lungs, throwing her arms into the air and rushing towards you like a child would when seeing a new family dog or cat. Her massive, bizarrely strong arms grabbing you off the ground by the back of your shirt and smashing you into her cavernous cleavage for the biggest, sweatiest, hug you’ve ever been given.
“Daniel it’s really you!! We’ve missed you sooo much!!” Your old, massive friend beamed in such a load voice you managed to hear it as clearly as you would outside her breasts as your entire head and shoulders were thrashed and smashed between the swamp that was Haley’s boob flesh, your mouth filling with her salty sweat and face being smeared across the fatty flesh with not a hit of resistance.
“I can’t believe you agreed to move down with us!! I mean I didn’t doubt you missed us but my heart practically stopped dead when you decided to take up our offer to set up shop here!!” Haley laughed, pulling you out from your chest hung prison, your entire head completely drenched and your mouth struggling to swallow the remained of her sweaty boob lake.
“Now we all get to be ROOMMATES!! Just like how we played pretend as kids!!” She grinned, your disoriented mind quickly putting itself together as you looked at Haley’s intently happy smile.
“Well actually we mostly played astronaut and superhero, not anything like house, Haley...” Roxanne corrected, having clearly made her way to the two of you while her sister was hugging your breath away, a gentle, but still very much present, grin drawn on her plump face as she looked down at you as well.
“But she’s right, we’re so happy you’re here Daniel! We’ve got everything ready back at the apartment and we can really catch up when we get back!” Roxanne directed, looking her more energetic sister in the eyes in a silent reminder of how they clearly planned to handle your arrival.
“Yeah! We’ve ordered food from bunch of different places to snack on while we talk and your beds all nice and ready for ya! OHH it’s just gonna be like those sleepovers we had!!” Haley squealed in glee, placing you down on the ground and danced in place in what you could only describe as a stroke of childhood nostalgia ran through her.
As the massive blonde did this strange display, you focused on getting yourself in order. The collective shock of your childhood friends becoming hulking blobs and the rush of seeing them putting you in a honest state of disbelief, your hands instinctively gripping your luggage as your eyes locked on the ground, trying to get your head around everything.
“I know it’s a bit overwhelming...” Roxanne soothed softly to you, your eyes shooting up to her bloated form, barely seeing her serene face past her stomach as she smiled down at you.
“But don’t worry, we’re here to help you ever..every..eve...” Roxanne continued, tripping up on her words as a deep grumble rang in her gut, one of her chubby hands patting it in a wince. Which was followed by a deep, splattering,
PHHHHRRRRRSSSSSTTTT
A foggy shart that lasted only a short, agonizing 5 seconds, but a horrific eternity as your nose wrenched and your eyes watered from what you could only describe as a blend rancid meat and shit burst from your friends no doubt monstrous ass.
“Every step of the way!” Your gassy old friend finished with a relief in her voice at the sharts end, her sympathetic, smiling face still present as she looked at your struggling to breath form, clearly not registering how bad her gas was.
“Okay! Okay! Okay! I’m better now!!” Haley sighed, her already sweaty body now perspiring even more her salty sweat from her miniature dance session.
“Now let’s get moving guys! We’ve got hot food and long night ahead of us!!” She declared, pointing towards the sidewalk triumphantly, followed by her bouncy self speed walking down the way she pointed and motioning Roxanne and you to follow.
With a deep sigh, you did just that, with Roxanne coming up the rear as the three of you went to the Law Sister’s apartment, and, for better or worse, the beginning of your new life....

A walk that went down with...

No issue! You got the apartment building pretty quick!

Something unfortunately happened on your short walk over....
155331.title: Daniel Baker

1553311.content:
The walk to the apartment had no issues, save for the unfortunate need to walk behind Haley as she led you forward, her ungodly B.O trailing behind her in an invisible miasma that made your eyes water in a struggle you strained to keep quiet out of courtesy.
A task you found difficult as you couldn’t help but stare at her short painted ass, a sight that gave you a chilling reminder of how large she has gotten as the two, swollen globals were both larger than your entire upper body!! But, you needed to focus, you’ve made a commitment to these two, and your just gonna have to get used to their new....girth.

“So...how much longer?” You croaked, trying to reorient yourself as your eyes darted away from the fatty cheeks of Haley and to the other side of the street in a bid to not stare at them.

“Oh we’re almost there! We just have to turn...” Haley paused, her eyes darting from the left turn following the sidewalk and the right turn across the street, clearly no sure herself where she was going.

“Umm..” she hummed in her confusion, taking a abrupt stop to figure out which way she needed to go, her fatty form wobbling from the sudden reprise. Her stop, unfortunately, was something you failed to notice in your effort to avoid staring at her ass, as your perfectly aligned heights caused your turned head to walk right dead center into her asscrack!

In what felt like hours to you, Your face quickly sank into her butt in a sensation you could only describe as layer upon layer of oiled fat over stone carved muscle sucking you in like a sinkhole, your nose slurping in the most horrific mix of B.O and sulfuric stink as your face was once again washed in a surge of sweat that had collected in between her globes and splashed against your already soiled skin. Your skinny frame jumping back and your hands quickly rushing towards your face to wipe the ass sweat from your face, the salty, intestinal odor hanging on your nose as you silently gagged in surprise. Your eyes quickly looking up to the girls to see if they’d notice, but Haley seemed engrossed in thought, and Roxanne was simply looking annoyed from behind.

“Haley do I need to remind you every time? We go...” Roxanne began, a light, but annoyed, grin across her face as she began to point left, but was quickly stopped by Haley as she yelled.

“This way! Haha! I forget sometimes!” She finally realized as her fatty hand pointed just where Roxanne about to, who closed her plump lips and shook her head as her lively sister lead on, with you quickly following behind...

After a few short minutes, you finally made it! Before you was a modest, three story, red brick apartment building placed in the middle of a calm street, with small (relative to the sisters size) mom and pop stores placed around it, a fact that gave it a very homey feel, like it had its own little slice of life awash in massive city.

“This is it! What do you think?!” Haley grinned excitedly, bouncing up and down as she and her sister looked down at you for an answer.

“It’s honesty nice! Definitely feels like a safe little area with a comfortable suburbia feel...” you answered honestly, trying to look past their massive boobs and swollen stomach to make eye contact with the two.

“Well put! The stores around here are very nice too. We will have to show you them sometime.” Roxanne went on, reaching her fatty hand down behind your torso and slowly pushing you forward towards the building, with Haley following behind.

“But all that can wait, it’s time to give you the grand tour!” Roxanne declared, walking you towards a large rotating door at the entrance of the building, quickly shuffling you into the small, rotating door with her. Your skinny frame pressed up against her sweater sealed stomach as you were giving a earful of what sounded like a intestinal demolish derby thrashing around within her! A thought you luckily didn’t have to dwell on as you two quickly popped out and were greeted by a small, very nice lobby. The lobby was in a T shape, with the front desk (which currently has a “out to third lunch” sign on it), mail boxes and a handful of massive chairs strung around circular tables making up the center, with two opposite halls at the end of the lobby from there. Without being given much time to take this room in, your big friends shuffled you forward toward the leftward hallway, the walls colored with a gentle tan and studded with wooden doors with a room number tacked on either side. With the three of you finally stopping at a door labeled 78.

“And here we are!” Haley nearly screamed in excitement, her arm shooting down into her swampy cleavage where, after a bit of rummaging, she pulled out a soaked key attached to a white lanyard.

“Here! Use my key and do the honors!” She giggles, leaning down and dropping in in you hands with a...

Splat

You wince slightly at the intensely warm and slimy item, but you stomach through it and, with a small leap to reach the door knob, you unlocked the door and see what the start of your new life will look like…
1553311.title: The Law Sister Apartment Tour! (Part 1)

choices: Dinner And a Promise of Employment with Either Sister
15533111.content:
And it looked...troubling. You weren’t sure WHAT to expect after you got an eye (and nose) full of Haley and Roxanne, but you were not as shocked at what you saw as you feared to find. The apartment wasn’t the biggest, with what you saw from the door was a small living room area at the left, a kitchenette to the right, and a blue door down the middle leading to what you presumed was the rest of the place.
The living area was modest, with a massive black leather couch, a small table with a lamp, a wooden cabinet with a wide screen TV placed atop it, and several gaming systems stacked atop the other in a very hazardous display. The kitchen was a lot bigger, with all the bells and whistles on would expect from a kitchen: sink, cabinets, microwave and oven. The thing that stuck out was the absolutely massive, chrome fridge! It was at least twice as big as you were! What made you more surprised was the massive, wooden dinner table right in the center of the area, that, oddly, didn’t have any chairs to pair with it. The more insane fact though was the mountain of fast food bags heaped on the table. So many different companies and brands labeled across the grease soaked bags you wouldn’t hesitate to call it a fast food feast!


“So, what do you think, Daniel?” Roxanne asked, her plump face contorted in a sweet grin as she looked down at you.


“It’s...definitely your guy’s apartment!” You whimpered, trying to be polite to them and trying to convince yourself of what a good idea this decision was.


“Yep! We really made it home! Now let’s show you your room and let’s eeeeaaattt!!!” Haley screeched, rubbing across the apartment and throwing open the door, clearing VERY eager to eat.


With a sigh, Roxanne nodded and followed her older sister wordlessly, her immense girth slowly moving past you, where, almost in slow motion, the sight of her ass finally came into vision, and, quiet easily, took up ALL YOUR VISION! Her backside looked like twin mountains of yoga pant fabric covered fat, each massive cheek looking like they had entire grown men stuffed in them with how huge they are! With a wordless breath, you followed the planet that was Roxanne’s ass as it led you down a short hallway to a wide wooden door. The mass turning so Roxanne could look at you, a big grin across her face, which, as you angled your head, contrasted Haley’s face as it was twisted in a disappointed pout as she opened the door.


“And this is where you will be staying Daniel...with me!” Roxanne clapped, grabbing your shoulder and jerking you inside alongside her, her hands starched wide to the reveal of her, or rather, you and her room.
The room was a bit of the smaller side for a girl as big as Roxanne, a square shaped, windowless, red colored area with what looked like a bathroom attached to it. Various pieces of wall hung posters and art pieces that ranged from cartoons to still life’s decorating it in a almost tasteful manner. As your eyes scanned the room, right in front of you was a large grey desk with a simple, black rolling chair paired with it. The desk in particular being covered with wrappers of junk food of all varieties and a grease covered laptop right in center like a island in a sea of waste. Across to the other side of the room was a wide reach in closet, most of the clothes that would be there completely thrown into a massive, stain covered heap right in front of it that you could swear had literal stink lines coming off it from how fowl the cloths that made it up looked. At another end of the room was, to your surprise, a bunk bed. A large, almost industrial looking metal framed bunk bed with already neatly placed white blanket, sheets and pillows on both mattresses, the cleanliness of which was quite bizarre when compared to the rest of the room. The last end of the room was the one that had a doorless entrance to a unlit bathroom, a side that had several dressers paired with it that were covered various trinkets and garbage across the tops.


“Wow...bunk beds…” you say aloud surprised, which was immediately met with an enthusiastic clap as Roxanne walked over to twin bed structure.
“I know right! They were having a sale and instead of buying a whole new bed for you we figured this would be a lot more fun! It’s heavy duty so no chance of it breaking with even 3 of me sleeping on top of it!” She explained, her fatty form ascending the side ladder and jumping onto the top bunk with a noticeable creek of the metal as she did, immediately casting doubt on her claim in your mind as you gave a strained, supportive smile and thumbs up to her as she looked down from the bed.


“And, just so you're aware, Daniel, I was supposed to be your roomie but Roxanne tricked me out of it...” Haley huffed as she leaned against the doorway with a annoyed look directed at her sister, who immediately shot one back.


“She’s lying! We promised to settle it with a coin toss and she lost and refuses to believe it was fair because the coin was MINE so it HAD to be fixed!” Roxanne groaned, her fatty face wobbling with anger as she clearly has had this argument one to many times for her patience to kept.


“I’m just saying we should have done it with a coin we got from the neighbors to be safe just in case! Plus the bunk bed thing was my idea so I should have had Daniel sleeping in my room...” Haley explained, twirling a lock of her blonde hair sadly and pouting like she was a child who was denied a toy she wanted at a store.


“Well fairs fair Haley, live with it.” Roxanne concluded, turning her attention back to you with a smile.


“So you can leave your stuff here and I’ll help you unpack later! Right now, it’s time to eat!” She declared, climbing down the steps faster than you’d ever expect a girl her size to move and, with one fatty hand, grabbed you by the waistline and, with her sister already fast out the door, jogged out the room to the kitchen to the feast left steaming at the table. Your skinny frame smushed to the side of her swollen gut, so fatty and almost gelatinous you sunk into it as your body was pressed against it, which gave off far too many gurgling sounds for you to be comfortable.

This marshmallow like press quickly ended however as Roxanne, with a huff in her breath, reached the kitchen table and placed you down on the ground carefully. What you went on to see was strained as your head hardly even reaching high enough to see past the counter, but what you did see was Roxanne and Haley grab as many of the fast food bags as they could carry in their fatty arms and, with a huff, hurried to the couch in a sibling race which ended in the two of them slamming into the leather coach on either side, the massive amount of weight landing all at once causing the poor coach to groan as all of its room was devoured by Haley’s wide hips and Roxanne’s monstrous ass, their fat oozing over the sides of it with how poorly it fit the two of them.

“Um...so you don’t don’t have kitchen chairs or anything?” You asked dumbfounded at what you just witnessed.
“Oh..*Munch*...*Munch* yeah we did!” Haley began to explain as she dug into three foot long subs with one hand and a super sized, bacon wrapped and cheese oozing hamburger in the other, grease and melted cheese already oozing down her face and sinking into her cavernous cleavage.
“But we threw them out after Roxanne kept breaking them with that queenly ass of hers!” Haley chuckled, finishing up her burger and using her free hand to slap her sister’s ass meat that pressed up against her, startling it’s owner as she was devouring a burrito the size of her head, causing her, with her head turned to Haley, to let out a hardy BBUURRP her sister’s face that shot beans and meat across her frame, something she hardly paid it any mind and continued to eat.

“*Munch* go ahead and grab some food from the table Daniel and join us! I’m sure we can make room!” Roxanne grinned, four entire hotdogs between her fingers that she slurped down without taking a breath, staining the rims of her mouth with mustard and relish as she looked at you expectingly.

“Uh I would but..I actually ate before I got here! So not really hungry!” You excused, not wanting to go anywhere NEAR those too as they ate.

“I was actually wanting to start looking jobs now, I want to get one as soon as possible so I can pay my part of the rent and give back to you guys for everything you done for me so far..” you said sincerely, honestly touched with how much effort (no matter how gross, these girls were putting in making you apart of their life).

“Awe...” went the two sisters, mouths stuffed to the brim with food as they let out their mutual sound of wholeness that almost made you forget the horrific display of them eating was. Which, after a few short seconds of chewing, Haley turned to you and said,
“Well you won’t worry about that, Daniel!” Because...”


“We both talked our bosses into giving you a interview! Their shorted staffed and either one definitely needs someone like you on board! So sit down and eat with us and catch up!”

“We’ve been putting together a list of job offers we found around town! It’s back in Roxanne’s room! Go ahead and read through it and we’ll bring you something to eat later!”
15533111.title: The Law Sister Apartment Tour! (Part 2)

155331111.content:
“We both talked our bosses into giving you an interview! Their short staffed and either one definitely needs someone like you on board! So sit down and eat with us and catch up!”

“Really? Thanks! Where do you guys work?” You asked with a genuine smile across your face, happy something good was catching you offer guard for once!

“No no no, Daniel, no more talking till you get some food and sit down!” Haley asserted with an almost childish, angry, pouting face, with Roxanne, her mouth half open to swallow an entire veggie and pineapple pizza she had rolled up like a burrito, nodding in silent agreement.

“Fine, Fine, you win...” you sighed, resigning yourself to this clearly gross situation with the prospect of your career being moved forward.

“*Chew* *Chew* BBBURRPP Good choice, Daniel! Here, you can have one of my pizza boxes!” Roxanne assured, completely eating the pizza she had just started to eat like it just a slice itself! With her hands-free, she rummaged through bag heap on her lap and retrieved a grease-drenched pizza box, handing it to gently with a greasy smile on her face.

“I’m pretty sure that one’s plain cheese! Or was it meat lovers?” Roxanne thought out loud, one hand stroking her fatty chin thoughtfully and the other pulling out a fistful of barbecue chicken wings from another of the bags before stuffing them in her gaping mouth. Curious yourself, you pop open the box and find it was neither, this one was coated in unions and peppers of various colorations.

“Uhh, this one has unions and peppers actually...” You shrugged, not minding the toppings but doubting your ability to eat all of it nor if you could even eat next to these two...

“Really? BURPPP Oh well whatever, I’m sure I’ll find those other two eventually!” Roxanne grinned, cramming the remainder of the wings into her mouth and licking her fingers clean of the sauce with almost laser precision to where the sauce was localized, her tongue wrapping around bee swollen fingers and lapping off the sauce to an almost inhuman level of effectiveness.

“Yeah, yeah...I’m sure. Uh, where do I sit?” You asked nervously, calling to attention the zero amount of space the two sisters leave between them due to their mutual largeness.

“Oh, uh...we honestly didn’t think of that...” Roxanne admitted, looking to her sister, who was currently eating an entire meatloaf like an apple, with a worried look.

“Uh...*chew*...oh I'm sure we can squeeze you in between us! It will just *BBUURRPP* take a bit more effort is all!” Haley grinned optimistically, swallowing the remainder of the meatloaf and got to work. With both of her greasy and sauce-coated hands, Haley lurched down and grabbed you right around the waist like you were nothing but a doll, turning you around so you were and then brought you right above the half an inch space where her upper thigh and Roxanne ass meat met.

“Umm, I don’t think this is much of a good idea Haley...” Roxanne warned, chewing on a burrito slowly as she watched you and what her older sister was about to do.

“Well, we won’t know unless we try!” Haley yelled, slamming your butt down between their sweaty flesh, which only proved to literally bounce you off like their fat was a trampoline! With the seat of your pants feeling like you had just sat on warm melted butter with the sweat that had splashed on your entire pants!

“Okay yeah, this totally isn’t going to work...” Haley blushed, putting you down back on the ground, your hands still clasped around the pizza Box as you were both indifferent to where you sat and relieved that Haley’s plan was a failure!

“Well I guess I could just sit on the floor, I don’t mind...” You said honestly, seeing it as a much cleaner alternative to sitting next to them in any capacity.

“No, we should try to think of a better solution then just stuffing you between us, Daniel. With you living with us this is something we need to iron out!” Roxanne countered, stopping her feasting and began jerking her head and shoulders around, inspecting any possible space to put you.

“Well, this isn’t ideal, but what we could do is...”

“Move our food together onto my lap and you sit on Haley’s lap! My thighs are thicker so the food would have less of a chance to fall between them with my movements...”

“I got a lot of space between my crack when I lean, we could sit you there and I’ll hand you food to eat...”
155331111.title: Dinner And a Promise of Employment

info.brief_description: Welcome to the slobbiest town in the world.
info.description:
Hershey is a quiet little town that nobody knows much about, other than the chocolate factory there. However, this is not the Hershey you may be thinking of.

This town boasts some of the finest quality chocolate in the world, and it turns out the locals can't get enough of it. It comes cheaper than water to them, and the majority of them have indulged in it for generations now. This caused their tiny population to expand greatly... just not in number of people. In this town, to be skinny is to be part of the minority; as a necessity, everything in Hershey is built to accommodate their primarily large population, from custom built, super sized, triple reinforced furniture to entire houses being scaled up so people can get through their own front doors every day. Those who live the "thicc" live have glamorized it, and developed their own kind of culture within the town. Things that would generally be considered "gross" or "inappropriate" in other parts of the world have become stylish here.

Most of this story follows the people of this town, choosing a member of one of the many families to follow. Alternatively, you can follow the perspective of someone just moving into town, having no knowledge of the people here.

The main focus of this story will be BBW's/BBM's being slobby and generally gross. Excessive eating and weight gain, squashing, vore and the like go along with that, with the skinny people receiving the brunt of the suffering. Incest is also encouraged since there's lots of family involved.

Rules for this story:
         While vore is greatly encouraged, it should only be soft vore. No hard vore, no blood and gore, no remains, and just no describing death in general. Digestion can happen, but do not describe the process, it can only be implied that it happened.
         Try to keep the main characters in the story. You can add as many side characters as you want for them to interact with and to act as expendables, but the main characters should survive for a good long time. Any fate that befalls a side character is also subject to the first rule.
         Your imagination can run wild here, just make sure your chapter makes sense, is coherent, and is at least 1000 characters long. More description is better for everyone!
info.pretty_title: Slob Town: The Fattest Place on Earth
